    <script type="application/javascript">
        function adjustViewport() {
            var screenWidthPx = Math.min($(window).width(), window.screen.width);
            var siteWidthPx = 1100; // min width of site
            var ratio = Math.min(screenWidthPx / siteWidthPx, 1.0);
            var viewport = "width=device-width, initial-scale=" + ratio;
            $('#viewport').attr('content', viewport);
            var style = $('<style>html * { max-height: 1000000px; }</style>');
            $('html > head').append(style);
        }

        if ( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPad|iPod|BlackBerry/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ) {
            adjustViewport();
        }
    </script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var queryMobile = Codeforces.queryString.mobile;
    if (queryMobile === "true" || queryMobile === "false") {
        Codeforces.putToStorage("useMobile", queryMobile == "true");
    } else {
        var useMobile = Codeforces.getFromStorage("useMobile");
        if (useMobile === true || useMobile === false) {
            if (useMobile != false) {
                Codeforces.redirect(Codeforces.updateUrlParameter(document.location.href, "mobile", useMobile));
            }
        }
    }
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    window.fbAsyncInit = function() {
        FB.init({
            appId      : '554666954583323',
            xfbml      : true,
            version    : 'v2.8'
        });
        FB.AppEvents.logPageView();
    };

    (function(d, s, id){
        var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
        if (d.getElementById(id)) {return;}
        js = d.createElement(s); js.id = id;
        js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/en_US/sdk.js";
        fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);
    }(document, 'script', 'facebook-jssdk'));
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    if (window.parent.frames.length > 0) {
        window.stop();
    }
</script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(document).ready(function () {
    (function () {
        jQuery.expr[':'].containsCI = function(elem, index, match) {
            return !match || !match.length || match.length < 4 || !match[3] || (
                    elem.textContent || elem.innerText || jQuery(elem).text() || ''
            ).toLowerCase().indexOf(match[3].toLowerCase()) >= 0;
        }
    }(jQuery));

    $.ajaxPrefilter(function(options, originalOptions, xhr) {
        var csrf = Codeforces.getCsrfToken();

        if (csrf) {
            var data = originalOptions.data;
            if (originalOptions.data !== undefined) {
                if (Object.prototype.toString.call(originalOptions.data) === '[object String]') {
                    data = $.deparam(originalOptions.data);
                }
            } else {
                data = {};
            }
            options.data = $.param($.extend(data, { csrf_token: csrf }));
        }
    });

    window.getCodeforcesServerTime = function(callback) {
        $.post("/data/time", {}, callback, "json");
    }

    window.updateTypography = function () {
        $("div.ttypography code").addClass("tt");
        $("div.ttypography pre>code").addClass("prettyprint").removeClass("tt");
        $("div.ttypography table").addClass("bordertable");
        prettyPrint();
    }

    $.ajaxSetup({ scriptCharset: "utf-8" ,contentType: "application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8", headers: {
        'X-Csrf-Token': Codeforces.getCsrfToken()
    }});

    window.updateTypography();

    Codeforces.signForms();

    setTimeout(function() {
        $(".second-level-menu-list").lavaLamp({
            fx: "backout",
            speed: 1000
        });
    }, 0);


    Codeforces.countdown();
    $("a[rel='photobox']").colorbox();


    function showAnnouncements(json) {
        //info("j=" + JSON.stringify(json));

        if (json.t != "a") {
            return;
        }
        // console.log("Got announcement from channel");
        setTimeout(function() {
            Codeforces.showAnnouncements(json.d, "en");
        }, Math.random() * 500);
    }
    if (Codeforces.getParticipantChannel()) {
        Codeforces.subscribe(Codeforces.getParticipantChannel(), function(json) {
            showAnnouncements(json);
        });
    }

    if (Codeforces.getContestChannel()) {
        Codeforces.subscribe(Codeforces.getContestChannel(), function(json) {
            showAnnouncements(json);
        });
    }

    if (Codeforces.getGlobalChannel()) {
        Codeforces.subscribe(Codeforces.getGlobalChannel(), function(json) {
            showAnnouncements(json);
        });
    }

    if (Codeforces.getUserChannel()) {
        Codeforces.subscribe(Codeforces.getUserChannel(), function(json) {
            showAnnouncements(json);
        });
    }

    $(".clickable-title").click(function() {
        Codeforces.alert($(this).attr("title"));
    }).css("position", "relative").css("bottom", "3px");


    Codeforces.reformatTimes();
    Codeforces.initializePubSub();

    Codeforces.setupSpoilers();
    Codeforces.setupTutorials("/data/problemTutorial");
        });
    </script>

        $(document).ready(function () {
            $("input.search").focus(function () {
                if ($(this).attr("data-isPlaceholder") === "true") {
                    $(this).val("");
                    $(this).removeAttr("data-isPlaceholder");

        <form class="handleForm" method="post"><input type='hidden' name='csrf_token' value='9bfdd3fcd86207d26af3d0df82b7a3cf'/>
            <div style="padding:1em;text-align:right;">
                <label style="padding-right:1em;">Handle:
                    <input style="width:12em;" type="text" class="handleBox"/>
                </label>
            </div>
            <div style="padding: 0 1em 1em 1em;text-align:right;">
                <input style="height:1.65em;padding:0 0.75em;" type="submit" value="Find"/>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(document).ready(function () {
    $(".handleBox").autocomplete("/data/handles", {
        delay: 200,
        width: 200,
        selectFirst: false,
        matchContains: true,
        minChars: 3
    });
    $(".handleForm").attr("autocomplete", "off").submit(function () {
        var link = "/profile/userHandle".replace(
            "userHandle", $(this).find(".handleBox").val()
        );
        window.location = link;
        return false;
    });
        });
    </script>

                        <div id="pageContent" class="content-with-sidebar">
<div style="margin-bottom:2em;">


<div class="topic" topicId="51485">
    <div class="title">
            <a href="/blog/entry/51250">            <p>Codeforces Round #407</p>
</a>
    </div>

    <div class="info" style="position:relative;">
            By&nbsp;<a href="/profile/I_love_Maria_Ivanova" title="Candidate Master I_love_Maria_Ivanova" class="rated-user user-violet">I_love_Maria_Ivanova</a>,
                <a href="/topic/51485/en1">history</a>,
            <span class="format-humantime" title="Mar/27/2017 19:55">25 hours ago</span>,
            translation,
            <img style="position: relative;top: 5px;" src="http://st.codeforces.com/s/91331/images/flags/24/gb.png" alt="In English" title="In English"/>,

<a class="attach-blogEntry-51250-to-contest-link" href="#"><img src="http://st.codeforces.com/s/91331/images/icons/paperclip-16x16.png" title="Attach this blog to some contest as a resource"/></a>

<style type="text/css">
    .attach-blogEntry-51250-to-contest-form tr:not(:last-of-type) td {
        padding-bottom: 1em;
    }

    .blogEntry-51250-error {
        font-size: 1.1rem;
    }
</style>

<div class="attach-blogEntry-51250-to-contest-form-holder" style="display: none;padding: 1em;margin: 1em;">
    <form class="attach-blogEntry-51250-to-contest-form" method="post"><input type='hidden' name='csrf_token' value='9bfdd3fcd86207d26af3d0df82b7a3cf'/>
        <table style="width: 100%;">
            <thead>
            </thead>
            <tbody>
        <tr class="subscription-row blogEntry-51250-blogId-error blogEntry-51250-error">
            <td>&nbsp;</td>
        <td colspan="2"><div class="shiftUp">        <span class="error for__blogEntry-51250-blogId">-</span>
</div></td>
        </tr>
            <tr>
                <td style="width: 30%;"><label for="blogEntry-51250-contestId">Contest:</label></td>
                <td>
                    <select id="blogEntry-51250-contestId" name="contestId" style="width: 100%;float: left;" disabled>
                        <option value=""></option>
                    </select>
                </td>
                <td>
                    <img id="blogEntry-51250-contestId-loading-indicator" src="http://st.codeforces.com/s/91331/images/indicator.gif"/>
                </td>
            </tr>
        <tr class="subscription-row blogEntry-51250-contestId-error blogEntry-51250-error">
            <td>&nbsp;</td>
        <td colspan="2"><div class="shiftUp">        <span class="error for__blogEntry-51250-contestId">-</span>
</div></td>
        </tr>
            <tr>
                <td style="width: 30%;"><label for="blogEntry-51250-resourceType">Type:</label></td>
                <td>
                    <select id="blogEntry-51250-resourceType" name="resourceType" style="width: 100%;">
                        <option value="" selected></option>
                        <option value="STATEMENT">statements</option>
                        <option value="TUTORIAL">tutorial</option>
                        <option value="ANNOUNCEMENT">announcement</option>
                        <option value="DISCUSSION">discussion</option>
                    </select>
                </td>
                <td></td>
            </tr>
        <tr class="subscription-row blogEntry-51250-resourceType-error blogEntry-51250-error">
            <td>&nbsp;</td>
        <td colspan="2"><div class="shiftUp">        <span class="error for__blogEntry-51250-resourceType">-</span>
</div></td>
        </tr>
            <tr>
                <td colspan="2" style="text-align: center;">
                    <input type="submit" id="blogEntry-51250-resource-submit" value="Attach" disabled
                           style="padding: 0.25em 0.5em;margin: 1em;width: 8em;"/>
                </td>
                <td>
                    <img id="blogEntry-51250-resource-submitting-indicator" src="http://st.codeforces.com/s/91331/images/indicator.gif"
                         style="display: none;"/>
                </td>
            </tr>
            </tbody>
        </table>
    </form>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $(".blogEntry-51250-error").hide();

        $(".attach-blogEntry-51250-to-contest-link").click(function () {
            Codeforces.facebox(".attach-blogEntry-51250-to-contest-form-holder", "http://st.codeforces.com/s/91331");

            $("#facebox .attach-blogEntry-51250-to-contest-form").submit(function () {
                if ($(this).find(":disabled").length === 0) {
                    $("#facebox .blogEntry-51250-error").hide();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-51250-resource-submitting-indicator").show();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-51250-resource-submit").attr("disabled", "disabled");

                    //noinspection JSUnusedGlobalSymbols
                    $.post("/data/blogAndContest?action=attachBlogToContest", {
                        blogId:"65375", contestId:$("#facebox #blogEntry-51250-contestId").val(),
                        blogEntryId:"51250",
                        resourceType:$("#facebox #blogEntry-51250-resourceType").val()
                    }, function (json) {
                        var validated = true;

                        for (var key in json) {
                            if (json.hasOwnProperty(key) && key.indexOf("error__") === 0) {
                                validated = false;
                                $("#facebox .blogEntry-51250-" + key.substring("error__".length) + "-error").show();
                                $("#facebox .for__blogEntry-51250-" + key.substring("error__".length)).text(json[key]);
                            }
                        }

                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-51250-resource-submitting-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-51250-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        if (validated) {
                            $.facebox.close();
                            if (json["success"] === "true") {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("Blog has been successfully attached to selected contest");
                            } else {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("There is unexpected error while attaching blog to the contest");
                            }
                        }
                    }, "json");
                }

                return false;
            });

            var contestSelect = $("#blogEntry-51250-contestId");
            var popupContestSelect = $("#facebox #blogEntry-51250-contestId");

            if (popupContestSelect.is(":disabled")) {
                $.post("/data/contests?action=getContestListWithEditableResources", function (data) {
                    if (data["result"] === "success") {
                        var contests = data["contests"];

                        for (var i = 0, contestCount = contests.length; i < contestCount; ++i) {
                            //noinspection StringLiteralBreaksHTMLJS
                            var contestOptionHtml = "<option value=\"" + contests[i]["id"] + "\">"
                                    + contests[i]["id"] + " - " + contests[i]["name"] + "</option>";
                            contestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                            popupContestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                        }

                        contestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#blogEntry-51250-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#blogEntry-51250-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        popupContestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-51250-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-51250-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");
                    } else {
                        alert("Can't receive contest list");
                    }
                }, "json");
            }

            return false;
        });
    });
</script>



        <span style="position:absolute;right:0;top:0.05em;margin-right:1em;display:inline;font-size:0.75em;">
            <div style="margin-top:0.25em;">
            </div>
        </span>
    </div>

    <div class="content">
        <div class="ttypography"><p>Hello everyone!</p><p>Codeforces Round #407 for both divisions will happen on <a href="http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?day=29&amp;month=3&amp;year=2017&amp;hour=19&amp;min=05&amp;sec=0&amp;p1=166">Mar/29/2017 19:05 MSK</a>.</p><p>The problems were prepared by me (Ihor Barenblat), Stanislav <a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/Stastomash" title="Candidate Master Stastomash">Stastomash</a> Tomash and Anton <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/arsijo" title="International Grandmaster arsijo">arsijo</a> Tsypko. Great thanks to Ivan <a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/Fekete" title="Candidate Master Fekete">Fekete</a> Fekete, Adalbert <a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/Adalbert" title="Expert Adalbert">Adalbert</a> Makarovych, Roman <a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/pisos_pro" title="Expert pisos_pro">pisos_pro</a> Derkach, Vladislav <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/winger" title="International Grandmaster winger">winger</a> Isenbaev and Alex <a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/AlexFetisov" title="Candidate Master AlexFetisov">AlexFetisov</a> Fetisov for testing the round, Nikolay <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/KAN" title="Grandmaster KAN">KAN</a> Kalinin for his help with the round preparation and Mike <a class="rated-user user-admin" href="/profile/MikeMirzayanov" title="Headquarters, MikeMirzayanov">MikeMirzayanov</a> Mirzayanov for the Codeforces and Polygon systems.</p><p>As usual, contestants will have 2 hours to solve 5 problems. Scoring will be announced closer before the round.</p><p>Hope that everyone will find interesting problems. Good luck!</p></div><p><a href="/blog/entry/51250">Read more »</a></p>
    </div>

            <span class="format-humantime" title="Mar/26/2017 21:41">47 hours ago</span>,

<div class="attach-blogEntry-51232-to-contest-form-holder" style="display: none;padding: 1em;margin: 1em;">

                           style="padding: 0.25em 0.5em;margin: 1em;width: 8em;"/>
                </td>
                <td>
                    <img id="blogEntry-51232-resource-submitting-indicator" src="http://st.codeforces.com/s/91331/images/indicator.gif"

<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $(".blogEntry-51232-error").hide();

        $(".attach-blogEntry-51232-to-contest-link").click(function () {
            Codeforces.facebox(".attach-blogEntry-51232-to-contest-form-holder", "http://st.codeforces.com/s/91331");

            $("#facebox .attach-blogEntry-51232-to-contest-form").submit(function () {
                if ($(this).find(":disabled").length === 0) {
                    $("#facebox .blogEntry-51232-error").hide();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-51232-resource-submitting-indicator").show();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-51232-resource-submit").attr("disabled", "disabled");

                    //noinspection JSUnusedGlobalSymbols
                    $.post("/data/blogAndContest?action=attachBlogToContest", {
                        blogId:"53375", contestId:$("#facebox #blogEntry-51232-contestId").val(),
                        blogEntryId:"51232",
                        resourceType:$("#facebox #blogEntry-51232-resourceType").val()
                    }, function (json) {
                        var validated = true;

                        for (var key in json) {
                            if (json.hasOwnProperty(key) && key.indexOf("error__") === 0) {
                                validated = false;
                                $("#facebox .blogEntry-51232-" + key.substring("error__".length) + "-error").show();
                                $("#facebox .for__blogEntry-51232-" + key.substring("error__".length)).text(json[key]);
                            }
                        }

                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-51232-resource-submitting-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-51232-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        if (validated) {
                            $.facebox.close();
                            if (json["success"] === "true") {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("Blog has been successfully attached to selected contest");
                            } else {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("There is unexpected error while attaching blog to the contest");
                            }
                        }
                    }, "json");
                }

                return false;
            });

            var contestSelect = $("#blogEntry-51232-contestId");
            var popupContestSelect = $("#facebox #blogEntry-51232-contestId");

            if (popupContestSelect.is(":disabled")) {
                $.post("/data/contests?action=getContestListWithEditableResources", function (data) {
                    if (data["result"] === "success") {
                        var contests = data["contests"];

                        for (var i = 0, contestCount = contests.length; i < contestCount; ++i) {
                            //noinspection StringLiteralBreaksHTMLJS
                            var contestOptionHtml = "<option value=\"" + contests[i]["id"] + "\">"
                                    + contests[i]["id"] + " - " + contests[i]["name"] + "</option>";
                            contestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                            popupContestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                        }

                        contestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#blogEntry-51232-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#blogEntry-51232-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        popupContestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-51232-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-51232-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");
                    } else {
                        alert("Can't receive contest list");
                    }
                }, "json");
            }

            return false;
        });
    });
</script>



        <span style="position:absolute;right:0;top:0.05em;margin-right:1em;display:inline;font-size:0.75em;">
            <div style="margin-top:0.25em;">
            </div>
        </span>
    </div>

    <div class="content">
        <div class="ttypography"><p>Hello Codeforces!</p><p>Good news! Harbour.Space is supporting the return of a new series of educational rounds on Codeforces! You can read the details in the <a href="http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/51208">blog post</a>.</p> <div style="text-align: center;"><img src="http://codeforces.com/predownloaded/b5/00/b500f462d444675afcbf458ed4d396607277b544.png" style="max-width: 100.0%;max-height: 100.0%;" /></div><p>On <a href="https://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?day=27&amp;month=3&amp;year=2017&amp;hour=17&amp;min=35&amp;sec=0&amp;p1=166">March 27, 17:35 MSK</a> will be held Educational Codeforces Round 18.</p><p>You will be given 6 problems and 2 hours to solve them. We hope that everyone, both novices and experienced coders, will find something interesting in this contest. The contest will be unrated.</p><p>The round was prepared by Mikhail <a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/PikMike" title="Candidate Master PikMike">PikMike</a> Piklyaev, Mikhail <a class="rated-user user-admin" href="/profile/MikeMirzayanov" title="Headquarters, MikeMirzayanov">MikeMirzayanov</a> Mirzayanov and me. We'd like to thank Maxim <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/HellKitsune" title="International Grandmaster HellKitsune">HellKitsune</a> Finutin and Alexey <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/ashmelev" title="Grandmaster ashmelev">ashmelev</a> Shmelev for testing the round.</p><p>Wish you enjoy the contest! Good luck!</p><p>UPD: <a href="http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/51254">Editorial</a>.</p></div><p><a href="/blog/entry/51232">Read more »</a></p>
    </div>

    <div style="font-size: 1.1rem;line-height: 1.1rem;padding-bottom: 0.5em;">
    <img src="http://st.codeforces.com/s/91331/images/icons/paperclip-16x16.png" style="vertical-align: middle;"/> <span style="padding: 0 0.35em;">Announcement of <a href="/contest/792" class="notice" style="text-decoration: none;">Educational Codeforces Round 18</a></span>
    </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $(".blogEntry-51208-error").hide();

        $(".attach-blogEntry-51208-to-contest-link").click(function () {
            Codeforces.facebox(".attach-blogEntry-51208-to-contest-form-holder", "http://st.codeforces.com/s/91331");

            $("#facebox .attach-blogEntry-51208-to-contest-form").submit(function () {
                if ($(this).find(":disabled").length === 0) {
                    $("#facebox .blogEntry-51208-error").hide();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-51208-resource-submitting-indicator").show();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-51208-resource-submit").attr("disabled", "disabled");

                    //noinspection JSUnusedGlobalSymbols
                    $.post("/data/blogAndContest?action=attachBlogToContest", {
                        blogId:"1", contestId:$("#facebox #blogEntry-51208-contestId").val(),
                        blogEntryId:"51208",
                        resourceType:$("#facebox #blogEntry-51208-resourceType").val()
                    }, function (json) {
                        var validated = true;

                        for (var key in json) {
                            if (json.hasOwnProperty(key) && key.indexOf("error__") === 0) {
                                validated = false;
                                $("#facebox .blogEntry-51208-" + key.substring("error__".length) + "-error").show();
                                $("#facebox .for__blogEntry-51208-" + key.substring("error__".length)).text(json[key]);
                            }
                        }

                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-51208-resource-submitting-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-51208-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        if (validated) {
                            $.facebox.close();
                            if (json["success"] === "true") {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("Blog has been successfully attached to selected contest");
                            } else {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("There is unexpected error while attaching blog to the contest");
                            }
                        }
                    }, "json");
                }

                return false;
            });

            var contestSelect = $("#blogEntry-51208-contestId");
            var popupContestSelect = $("#facebox #blogEntry-51208-contestId");

            if (popupContestSelect.is(":disabled")) {
                $.post("/data/contests?action=getContestListWithEditableResources", function (data) {
                    if (data["result"] === "success") {
                        var contests = data["contests"];

                        for (var i = 0, contestCount = contests.length; i < contestCount; ++i) {
                            //noinspection StringLiteralBreaksHTMLJS
                            var contestOptionHtml = "<option value=\"" + contests[i]["id"] + "\">"
                                    + contests[i]["id"] + " - " + contests[i]["name"] + "</option>";
                            contestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                            popupContestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                        }

                        contestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#blogEntry-51208-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#blogEntry-51208-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        popupContestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-51208-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-51208-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");
                    } else {
                        alert("Can't receive contest list");
                    }
                }, "json");
            }

            return false;
        });
    });
</script>



        <span style="position:absolute;right:0;top:0.05em;margin-right:1em;display:inline;font-size:0.75em;">
            <div style="margin-top:0.25em;">
            </div>
        </span>
    </div>

    <div class="content">
        <div class="ttypography"><p>Hello Codeforces!</p><p>I am pleased to announce a long term partnership with Harbour.Space University and Codeforces.</p> <center> <img src="http://codeforces.com/predownloaded/b5/00/b500f462d444675afcbf458ed4d396607277b544.png" style="max-width: 100.0%;max-height: 100.0%;" /> </center><p>Harbour.Space is supporting the return of a new series of educational rounds on Codeforces! </p><p>They will take place with the regularity of ~2 times per month with the first round on <a href="http://timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?day=27&amp;month=3&amp;year=2017&amp;hour=17&amp;min=35&amp;sec=0&amp;p1=166">14:35 UTC, 27th of March, 2017</a>.</p><p>Education Rounds Rules:</p> <ul>   <li>Scholarships to study Data Science, Computer Science and Cybersecurity in Barcelona for best performing participants, courtesy of Harbour.Space University (more details later!);</li>   <li>Classic Duration: 1.5 — 2.5 hours;</li>   <li>The goal is rather to practice and to educate, than to compete;</li>   <li>Not only problems, but also exercises can be used;</li>   <li>Useful, even well-known ideas can be reused in order to introduce them to a wide range of participants;</li>   <li>Unrated (perhaps only for now);</li>   <li>We will conduct them in the ACM-ICPC mode;</li>   <li>The results that are obtained after the end of the round, are preliminary;</li>   <li>After the end of the round will be a 24-hour period of open hacks — any visitor of Codeforces may try to hack any complete solution to a problem of the last round (either from a contest, or from practice), the source code of hacking solution is available (you can copy the text and, for example, stress it);</li>   <li>All successful hacks from the previous item will be added to the official test set and after as long as 24 hours after the end of the round retesting of all complete solutions will be made;</li>   <li>Only after the final standings based on improved test data, the results are final;</li>   <li>Our ability to process such problems are limited, so actually the test suites from the jury are expected to end up incomplete — we are looking forward to your hacks!</li> </ul><p>In February I had a new and wonderful experience of coaching top teams at the <a href="http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/48905">Barcelona ACM-ICPC Bootcamp</a> hosted by <a href="http://harbour.space/">Harbour.Space University</a>. I was really impressed by the university, participating teams and fellow coaches from our community such as <a class="rated-user user-legendary" href="/profile/Endagorion" title="Legendary grandmaster Endagorion"><span class="legendary-user-first-letter">E</span>ndagorion</a>, <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/GlebsHP" title="International Grandmaster GlebsHP">GlebsHP</a>, <a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/Michael" title="Candidate Master Michael">Michael</a>, <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/Jacob" title="Grandmaster Jacob">Jacob</a> and <a class="rated-user user-black" href="/profile/snarknews" title="Unrated, snarknews">snarknews</a> that were also there.</p><p><iframe allowfullscreen="" frameborder="0" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ykhEUajq9Ng" width="560"></iframe></p><p>During the bootcamp it became clear to me that Harbour.Space University is a new type of university that’s reinventing the university experience. It is a modern, adaptable and flexible university that is doing amazing things in preparing talented students for careers in <a href="http://harbour.space/courses/computer-science">Computer Science</a>, <a href="http://harbour.space/courses/data-science">Data Science</a> and <a href="http://harbour.space/courses/cyber-security">Cyber Security</a>.</p><p>All of their programs are developed in collaboration with the industry and are taught by the top professionals in the respective fields such as <a href="http://harbour.space/Faculty/Data-science/Victor-Kantor">Viktor Kantor</a>, <a href="http://harbour.space/Faculty/Computer-Science/Edith-Elkind">Edith Elkind</a>, <a href="http://harbour.space/Faculty/Computer-Science/Alexander-Kulikov">Alexander Kulikov</a>, <a href="http://harbour.space/Faculty/Computer-Science/Alex-Dainiak">Alex Dainiak</a>, <a href="http://harbour.space/Faculty/Data-science/Sergey-Nikolenko">Sergey Nikolenko</a>, <a href="http://harbour.space/Faculty/Data-science/Deepa-Gupta">Deepa Gupta</a> and many others. I am delighted to be joining Harbour.Space fantastic faculty. Together we are developing a series of courses on competitive programming in addition to the bi-annual ACM ICPC Bootcamp that will be hosted by the university in Barcelona.</p></div><p><a href="/blog/entry/51208">Read more »</a></p>
    </div>

        $(document).ready(function () {
    $(".topic-vote-up-51443").click(function () {
        $.post("/data/topic/vote", {topicId: 51443, _tta: Codeforces.tta(), topicRevisionId: 117054, vote: +1}, function(data) {
            Codeforces.showMessage(data);
        }, "json");
        return false;
    });
    $(".topic-vote-down-51443").click(function () {
        $.post("/data/topic/vote", {topicId: 51443, _tta: Codeforces.tta(), topicRevisionId: 117054, vote: -1}, function(data) {
            Codeforces.showMessage(data);
        }, "json");
        return false;
    });
        });

                <a href="/topic/51318/en5">history</a>,

            <img style="position: relative;top: 5px;" src="http://st.codeforces.com/s/91331/images/flags/24/gb.png" alt="In English" title="In English"/>,

<a class="attach-blogEntry-51083-to-contest-link" href="#"><img src="http://st.codeforces.com/s/91331/images/icons/paperclip-16x16.png" title="Attach this blog to some contest as a resource"/></a>

<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $(".blogEntry-51083-error").hide();

        $(".attach-blogEntry-51083-to-contest-link").click(function () {
            Codeforces.facebox(".attach-blogEntry-51083-to-contest-form-holder", "http://st.codeforces.com/s/91331");

            $("#facebox .attach-blogEntry-51083-to-contest-form").submit(function () {
                if ($(this).find(":disabled").length === 0) {
                    $("#facebox .blogEntry-51083-error").hide();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-51083-resource-submitting-indicator").show();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-51083-resource-submit").attr("disabled", "disabled");

                    //noinspection JSUnusedGlobalSymbols
                    $.post("/data/blogAndContest?action=attachBlogToContest", {
                        blogId:"39093", contestId:$("#facebox #blogEntry-51083-contestId").val(),
                        blogEntryId:"51083",
                        resourceType:$("#facebox #blogEntry-51083-resourceType").val()
                    }, function (json) {
                        var validated = true;

                        for (var key in json) {
                            if (json.hasOwnProperty(key) && key.indexOf("error__") === 0) {
                                validated = false;
                                $("#facebox .blogEntry-51083-" + key.substring("error__".length) + "-error").show();
                                $("#facebox .for__blogEntry-51083-" + key.substring("error__".length)).text(json[key]);
                            }
                        }

                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-51083-resource-submitting-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-51083-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        if (validated) {
                            $.facebox.close();
                            if (json["success"] === "true") {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("Blog has been successfully attached to selected contest");
                            } else {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("There is unexpected error while attaching blog to the contest");
                            }
                        }
                    }, "json");
                }

                return false;
            });

            var contestSelect = $("#blogEntry-51083-contestId");
            var popupContestSelect = $("#facebox #blogEntry-51083-contestId");

            if (popupContestSelect.is(":disabled")) {
                $.post("/data/contests?action=getContestListWithEditableResources", function (data) {
                    if (data["result"] === "success") {
                        var contests = data["contests"];

                        for (var i = 0, contestCount = contests.length; i < contestCount; ++i) {
                            //noinspection StringLiteralBreaksHTMLJS
                            var contestOptionHtml = "<option value=\"" + contests[i]["id"] + "\">"
                                    + contests[i]["id"] + " - " + contests[i]["name"] + "</option>";
                            contestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                            popupContestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                        }

                        contestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#blogEntry-51083-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#blogEntry-51083-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        popupContestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-51083-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-51083-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");
                    } else {
                        alert("Can't receive contest list");
                    }
                }, "json");
            }

            return false;
        });
    });
</script>



        <span style="position:absolute;right:0;top:0.05em;margin-right:1em;display:inline;font-size:0.75em;">
            <div style="margin-top:0.25em;">
            </div>
        </span>
    </div>

    <div class="content">
        <div class="ttypography"><p>Hello Codeforces, and happy <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nowruz">Nowruz</a>.</p><p>It's an honor to announce you that Codeforces Round #406 is going to take place on <a href="http://timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?day=23&amp;month=3&amp;year=2017&amp;hour=18&amp;min=5&amp;sec=0&amp;p1=166">March 23rd</a>.</p><p>I'm the writer of this round and it is gonna be my 6th CF contest (there are still plenty coming...). There are 5 problems and you'll have 120 minutes to solve them.</p><p>I'd like to thank <a class="rated-user user-orange" href="/profile/keyvankhademi" title="Master keyvankhademi">keyvankhademi</a> and <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/waterfalls" title="International Grandmaster waterfalls">waterfalls</a> for testing this round, <a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/netman" title="Candidate Master netman">netman</a> and <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/KAN" title="Grandmaster KAN">KAN</a> for helping me prepare this round and <a class="rated-user user-admin" href="/profile/MikeMirzayanov" title="Headquarters, MikeMirzayanov">MikeMirzayanov</a> for awesome platforms of Codeforces and Polygon.</p><p>The main characters of this round are going to be Rick and Morty!!!</p><p><img alt=" " src="http://codeforces.com/predownloaded/68/22/68221ba2ceac6844ac2a6e81b2acde2ae12b6d9e.png" style="max-width: 100.0%;max-height: 100.0%;" /></p><p>Scoring will be posted soon.</p><p>Problems are sorted by their expected difficulty, but <strong>I strictly recommend you to read all the problems</strong>.</p><p>GL &amp; HF!</p><p><strong>P.S:</strong> Top IOI 2017 participant in each division (only with handle present in the future IOI handle list) will be rewarded with special Persian souvenirs in Tehran.</p><p><strong>UPD:</strong> Scoring distribution is: <strong>500, 1000, 1750, 2000, 2500</strong> for Div.2 and <strong>750, 1000, 1500, 2000, 2500</strong> for Div.1</p><p><strong>UPD:</strong> <a href="http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/51163">Editorial</a> is out!</p><p><strong>UPD:</strong> System test is over, congratulations to the winners.</p><p>Div.1 winners are:</p> <ol>   <li><a class="rated-user user-legendary" href="/profile/moejy0viiiiiv" title="Legendary grandmaster moejy0viiiiiv"><span class="legendary-user-first-letter">m</span>oejy0viiiiiv</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/Um_nik" title="International Grandmaster Um_nik">Um_nik</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-legendary" href="/profile/LHiC" title="Legendary grandmaster LHiC"><span class="legendary-user-first-letter">L</span>HiC</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-legendary" href="/profile/-XraY-" title="Legendary grandmaster -XraY-"><span class="legendary-user-first-letter">-</span>XraY-</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/ershov.stanislav" title="International Grandmaster ershov.stanislav">ershov.stanislav</a></li> </ol><p>Div.2 winners are:</p> <ol>   <li><a class="rated-user user-black" href="/profile/xumingkuan" title="Unrated, xumingkuan">xumingkuan</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/HXLLL" title="Expert HXLLL">HXLLL</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/Rpd-Strike" title="Expert Rpd-Strike">Rpd-Strike</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/U6121071173" title="Expert U6121071173">U6121071173</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/VoteBanned" title="Expert VoteBanned">VoteBanned</a></li> </ol><p>See you next time ;)</p></div><p><a href="/blog/entry/51083">Read more »</a></p>
    </div>

    <div style="font-size: 1.1rem;line-height: 1.1rem;padding-bottom: 0.5em;">
    <img src="http://st.codeforces.com/s/91331/images/icons/paperclip-16x16.png" style="vertical-align: middle;"/> <span style="padding: 0 0.35em;">Announcement of <a href="/contest/786" class="notice" style="text-decoration: none;">Codeforces Round #406 (Div. 1)</a></span>
    </div>

<div class="topic" topicId="51236">
    <div class="title">
            <a href="/blog/entry/51001">            <p>Russian Code Cup 2017 — Announcement</p>
</a>
    </div>

    <div class="info" style="position:relative;">
            By&nbsp;<a href="/profile/RussianCodeCup" title="Unrated, RussianCodeCup" class="rated-user user-black">RussianCodeCup</a>,
            <span class="format-humantime" title="Mar/15/2017 22:49">13 days ago</span>,
            translation,
            <img style="position: relative;top: 5px;" src="http://st.codeforces.com/s/91331/images/flags/24/gb.png" alt="In English" title="In English"/>,

<a class="attach-blogEntry-51001-to-contest-link" href="#"><img src="http://st.codeforces.com/s/91331/images/icons/paperclip-16x16.png" title="Attach this blog to some contest as a resource"/></a>

<style type="text/css">
    .attach-blogEntry-51001-to-contest-form tr:not(:last-of-type) td {
        padding-bottom: 1em;
    }

    .blogEntry-51001-error {
        font-size: 1.1rem;
    }
</style>

<div class="attach-blogEntry-51001-to-contest-form-holder" style="display: none;padding: 1em;margin: 1em;">
    <form class="attach-blogEntry-51001-to-contest-form" method="post"><input type='hidden' name='csrf_token' value='9bfdd3fcd86207d26af3d0df82b7a3cf'/>
        <table style="width: 100%;">
            <thead>
            </thead>
            <tbody>
        <tr class="subscription-row blogEntry-51001-blogId-error blogEntry-51001-error">
            <td>&nbsp;</td>
        <td colspan="2"><div class="shiftUp">        <span class="error for__blogEntry-51001-blogId">-</span>
</div></td>
        </tr>
            <tr>
                <td style="width: 30%;"><label for="blogEntry-51001-contestId">Contest:</label></td>
                <td>
                    <select id="blogEntry-51001-contestId" name="contestId" style="width: 100%;float: left;" disabled>
                        <option value=""></option>
                    </select>
                </td>
                <td>
                    <img id="blogEntry-51001-contestId-loading-indicator" src="http://st.codeforces.com/s/91331/images/indicator.gif"/>
                </td>
            </tr>
        <tr class="subscription-row blogEntry-51001-contestId-error blogEntry-51001-error">
            <td>&nbsp;</td>
        <td colspan="2"><div class="shiftUp">        <span class="error for__blogEntry-51001-contestId">-</span>
</div></td>
        </tr>
            <tr>
                <td style="width: 30%;"><label for="blogEntry-51001-resourceType">Type:</label></td>
                <td>
                    <select id="blogEntry-51001-resourceType" name="resourceType" style="width: 100%;">
                        <option value="" selected></option>
                        <option value="STATEMENT">statements</option>
                        <option value="TUTORIAL">tutorial</option>
                        <option value="ANNOUNCEMENT">announcement</option>
                        <option value="DISCUSSION">discussion</option>
                    </select>
                </td>
                <td></td>
            </tr>
        <tr class="subscription-row blogEntry-51001-resourceType-error blogEntry-51001-error">

        <td colspan="2"><div class="shiftUp">        <span class="error for__blogEntry-51001-resourceType">-</span>
</div></td>
        </tr>
            <tr>
                <td colspan="2" style="text-align: center;">
                    <input type="submit" id="blogEntry-51001-resource-submit" value="Attach" disabled
                           style="padding: 0.25em 0.5em;margin: 1em;width: 8em;"/>
                </td>
                <td>
                    <img id="blogEntry-51001-resource-submitting-indicator" src="http://st.codeforces.com/s/91331/images/indicator.gif"
                         style="display: none;"/>
                </td>
            </tr>
            </tbody>
        </table>
    </form>

<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $(".blogEntry-51001-error").hide();

        $(".attach-blogEntry-51001-to-contest-link").click(function () {
            Codeforces.facebox(".attach-blogEntry-51001-to-contest-form-holder", "http://st.codeforces.com/s/91331");

            $("#facebox .attach-blogEntry-51001-to-contest-form").submit(function () {
                if ($(this).find(":disabled").length === 0) {
                    $("#facebox .blogEntry-51001-error").hide();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-51001-resource-submitting-indicator").show();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-51001-resource-submit").attr("disabled", "disabled");

                    //noinspection JSUnusedGlobalSymbols
                    $.post("/data/blogAndContest?action=attachBlogToContest", {
                        blogId:"47376", contestId:$("#facebox #blogEntry-51001-contestId").val(),
                        blogEntryId:"51001",
                        resourceType:$("#facebox #blogEntry-51001-resourceType").val()
                    }, function (json) {
                        var validated = true;

                        for (var key in json) {
                            if (json.hasOwnProperty(key) && key.indexOf("error__") === 0) {
                                validated = false;
                                $("#facebox .blogEntry-51001-" + key.substring("error__".length) + "-error").show();
                                $("#facebox .for__blogEntry-51001-" + key.substring("error__".length)).text(json[key]);
                            }
                        }

                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-51001-resource-submitting-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-51001-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        if (validated) {
                            $.facebox.close();
                            if (json["success"] === "true") {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("Blog has been successfully attached to selected contest");
                            } else {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("There is unexpected error while attaching blog to the contest");
                            }
                        }
                    }, "json");
                }

                return false;
            });

            var contestSelect = $("#blogEntry-51001-contestId");
            var popupContestSelect = $("#facebox #blogEntry-51001-contestId");

            if (popupContestSelect.is(":disabled")) {
                $.post("/data/contests?action=getContestListWithEditableResources", function (data) {
                    if (data["result"] === "success") {
                        var contests = data["contests"];

                        for (var i = 0, contestCount = contests.length; i < contestCount; ++i) {
                            //noinspection StringLiteralBreaksHTMLJS
                            var contestOptionHtml = "<option value=\"" + contests[i]["id"] + "\">"
                                    + contests[i]["id"] + " - " + contests[i]["name"] + "</option>";
                            contestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                            popupContestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                        }

                        contestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#blogEntry-51001-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#blogEntry-51001-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        popupContestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-51001-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-51001-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");
                    } else {
                        alert("Can't receive contest list");
                    }
                }, "json");
            }

            return false;
        });
    });
</script>



        <span style="position:absolute;right:0;top:0.05em;margin-right:1em;display:inline;font-size:0.75em;">
            <div style="margin-top:0.25em;">
            </div>
        </span>
    </div>

    <div class="content">
        <div class="ttypography"><p>Hi, everyone!</p><p>We are pleased to announce Russian Code Cup 2017! Qualification rounds will start in April, the Final round will be held online in September. Each of the three Qualification rounds will allow 200 participants to qualify for Elimination round, top 50 from Elimination round will proceed to Final round. The problems will be both in Russian and in English.</p><p>The full schedule of the tournament can be found at <a href="http://russiancodecup.ru">http://russiancodecup.ru</a>, you can also register there. Note that you must register for the new season even if you took part in the previous tournaments.</p><p>We still have more than two weeks before the first Qualification, so we would like to invite everyone to the warm up round that will take plance on <a href="https://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?msg=RCC+2017+Warmup&amp;iso=20170319T14&amp;p1=166&amp;ah=2">Sunday, March 19, 14-00 Moscow time</a>. Visit <a href="http://russiancodecup.ru">http://russiancodecup.ru</a> to take part in the round, it will be 2 hours long.</p><p>Good luck to everyone and see you at Russian Code Cup 2017!</p><p><strong>UPD:</strong> We remind you that the Warmup Round will start at 14-00 Moscow time. Problems of the Warmup Round are based on IOIP problems (Russian contest for high school students, run today at several cities) that are prepared by the same team of authors. We kindly ask students that take part in IOIP to play fairly and not to try to take part in RCC Warmup. Good luck to everyone!</p><p><strong>UPD2:</strong> Thanks to all participants that made a real stress testing for our judging machines. Unfortunately we had long queues during the first hour, they were fixed, and from the middle of the contest the waiting time in most cases was limited to 2-3 minutes. We will make sure there would be no queues during further rounds.</p></div><p><a href="/blog/entry/51001">Read more »</a></p>
    </div>

    <div class="info" style="position:relative;">

<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $(".blogEntry-51039-error").hide();

        $(".attach-blogEntry-51039-to-contest-link").click(function () {
            Codeforces.facebox(".attach-blogEntry-51039-to-contest-form-holder", "http://st.codeforces.com/s/91331");

            $("#facebox .attach-blogEntry-51039-to-contest-form").submit(function () {
                if ($(this).find(":disabled").length === 0) {
                    $("#facebox .blogEntry-51039-error").hide();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-51039-resource-submitting-indicator").show();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-51039-resource-submit").attr("disabled", "disabled");

                    //noinspection JSUnusedGlobalSymbols
                    $.post("/data/blogAndContest?action=attachBlogToContest", {
                        blogId:"39427", contestId:$("#facebox #blogEntry-51039-contestId").val(),
                        blogEntryId:"51039",
                        resourceType:$("#facebox #blogEntry-51039-resourceType").val()
                    }, function (json) {
                        var validated = true;

                        for (var key in json) {
                            if (json.hasOwnProperty(key) && key.indexOf("error__") === 0) {
                                validated = false;
                                $("#facebox .blogEntry-51039-" + key.substring("error__".length) + "-error").show();
                                $("#facebox .for__blogEntry-51039-" + key.substring("error__".length)).text(json[key]);
                            }
                        }

                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-51039-resource-submitting-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-51039-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        if (validated) {
                            $.facebox.close();
                            if (json["success"] === "true") {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("Blog has been successfully attached to selected contest");
                            } else {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("There is unexpected error while attaching blog to the contest");
                            }
                        }
                    }, "json");
                }

                return false;
            });

            var contestSelect = $("#blogEntry-51039-contestId");
            var popupContestSelect = $("#facebox #blogEntry-51039-contestId");

            if (popupContestSelect.is(":disabled")) {
                $.post("/data/contests?action=getContestListWithEditableResources", function (data) {
                    if (data["result"] === "success") {
                        var contests = data["contests"];

                        for (var i = 0, contestCount = contests.length; i < contestCount; ++i) {
                            //noinspection StringLiteralBreaksHTMLJS
                            var contestOptionHtml = "<option value=\"" + contests[i]["id"] + "\">"
                                    + contests[i]["id"] + " - " + contests[i]["name"] + "</option>";
                            contestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                            popupContestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                        }

                        contestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#blogEntry-51039-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#blogEntry-51039-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        popupContestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-51039-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-51039-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");
                    } else {
                        alert("Can't receive contest list");
                    }
                }, "json");
            }

            return false;
        });
    });
</script>



        <span style="position:absolute;right:0;top:0.05em;margin-right:1em;display:inline;font-size:0.75em;">
            <div style="margin-top:0.25em;">
            </div>
        </span>
    </div>

    <div class="content">
        <div class="ttypography"><p>Hello.</p><p>The round 1 of VK Cup 2017 will take place on March 18 at 18:35 MSK (check your timezone <a href="https://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?day=18&amp;month=3&amp;year=2017&amp;hour=18&amp;min=35&amp;sec=0&amp;p1=166">here</a>), along with standard div1+2 Codeforces Round #405. The contest &quot;VK Cup 2017 — Round 1&quot; is for teams qualified from two Qualification Rounds. The top 400 teams will advance to the Round 2, while other ones will have one more chance in the Wild Card Round 1 in April. Those who don't participate in the VK Cup can take part in the Codeforces Round #405 individually (problems will be available in English too). All three rounds last 2 hours, and all are rated.</p><p>I want to thank: <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/KAN" title="Grandmaster KAN">KAN</a> for his help in the contest preparation, <a class="rated-user user-admin" href="/profile/MikeMirzayanov" title="Headquarters, MikeMirzayanov">MikeMirzayanov</a> that we are here, <a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/AlexFetisov" title="Candidate Master AlexFetisov">AlexFetisov</a> for testing, the VK company for this nice annual contest.</p><p>I'm a setter and I hope (and expect?) that you will enjoy the problems. During the contest, remember that you can read many problems and try to solve those that fit you most.</p><p>I wish you great fun and no frustrating bugs.</p><p>div2: 500-1000-1500-2000-2500<br />div1: 500-1000-1500- <strong>2250</strong> -2500<br />vk-cup: <strong>250</strong>-500-1000-1500- <strong>2250</strong> -2500</p><p>The contest is over. See the editorial <a href="http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/51068">here</a>. Congratulations to all who advanced to the next round, and congratulations to winners of each contest.</p><p>Specifically, the winners of VK Cup Round 1 are:</p> <ol>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/Zlobober" title="International Grandmaster Zlobober">Zlobober</a>, <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/zemen" title="International Grandmaster zemen">zemen</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-legendary" href="/profile/LHiC" title="Legendary grandmaster LHiC"><span class="legendary-user-first-letter">L</span>HiC</a>, <a class="rated-user user-legendary" href="/profile/V--o_o--V" title="Legendary grandmaster V--o_o--V"><span class="legendary-user-first-letter">V</span>--o_o--V</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/Arthur" title="Grandmaster Arthur">Arthur</a>, <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/kefaa" title="Grandmaster kefaa">kefaa</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/map" title="Candidate Master map">map</a>, <a class="rated-user user-orange" href="/profile/Babanin_Ivan" title="Master Babanin_Ivan">Babanin_Ivan</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-orange" href="/profile/felix" title="Master felix">felix</a>, <a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/Trumen" title="Grandmaster Trumen">Trumen</a></li> </ol><p>The winners of parallel rounds are:</p><p>Div. 1:</p> <ol>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/-XraY-" title="International Grandmaster -XraY-">-XraY-</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" </ol><p>Div. 2:</p> <ol>   <li><a class="rated-user user-cyan" href="/profile/rupxup" title="Specialist rupxup">rupxup</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/YES_RPG" title="Specialist HXLLL">HXLLL</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/Diversity" title="Expert Diversity">Diversity</a></li> </ol><p>I'm sorry for letting some slow solutions pass in the Rectangle Strips problem. I tried really hard to prepare tests there but apparently didn't succeed.</p></div><p><a href="/blog/entry/51039">Read more »</a></p>
    </div>

        }, "json");

    <div class="title">
            <a href="/blog/entry/50978">            <p>Codeforces Round #404. Announcement.</p>

    <div class="info" style="position:relative;">
            By&nbsp;<a href="/profile/alex256" title="Master alex256" class="rated-user user-orange">alex256</a>,
                <a href="/topic/51213/en8">history</a>,
            <span class="format-humantime" title="Mar/14/2017 15:47">2 weeks ago</span>,
            translation,
            <img style="position: relative;top: 5px;" src="http://st.codeforces.com/s/91331/images/flags/24/gb.png" alt="In English" title="In English"/>,

<a class="attach-blogEntry-50978-to-contest-link" href="#"><img src="http://st.codeforces.com/s/91331/images/icons/paperclip-16x16.png" title="Attach this blog to some contest as a resource"/></a>

<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $(".blogEntry-50978-error").hide();

        $(".attach-blogEntry-50978-to-contest-link").click(function () {
            Codeforces.facebox(".attach-blogEntry-50978-to-contest-form-holder", "http://st.codeforces.com/s/91331");

            $("#facebox .attach-blogEntry-50978-to-contest-form").submit(function () {
                if ($(this).find(":disabled").length === 0) {
                    $("#facebox .blogEntry-50978-error").hide();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-50978-resource-submitting-indicator").show();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-50978-resource-submit").attr("disabled", "disabled");

                    //noinspection JSUnusedGlobalSymbols
                    $.post("/data/blogAndContest?action=attachBlogToContest", {
                        blogId:"50324", contestId:$("#facebox #blogEntry-50978-contestId").val(),
                        blogEntryId:"50978",
                        resourceType:$("#facebox #blogEntry-50978-resourceType").val()
                    }, function (json) {
                        var validated = true;

                        for (var key in json) {
                            if (json.hasOwnProperty(key) && key.indexOf("error__") === 0) {
                                validated = false;
                                $("#facebox .blogEntry-50978-" + key.substring("error__".length) + "-error").show();
                                $("#facebox .for__blogEntry-50978-" + key.substring("error__".length)).text(json[key]);
                            }
                        }

                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-50978-resource-submitting-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-50978-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        if (validated) {
                            $.facebox.close();
                            if (json["success"] === "true") {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("Blog has been successfully attached to selected contest");
                            } else {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("There is unexpected error while attaching blog to the contest");
                            }
                        }
                    }, "json");
                }

                return false;
            });

            var contestSelect = $("#blogEntry-50978-contestId");
            var popupContestSelect = $("#facebox #blogEntry-50978-contestId");

            if (popupContestSelect.is(":disabled")) {
                $.post("/data/contests?action=getContestListWithEditableResources", function (data) {
                    if (data["result"] === "success") {
                        var contests = data["contests"];

                        for (var i = 0, contestCount = contests.length; i < contestCount; ++i) {
                            //noinspection StringLiteralBreaksHTMLJS
                            var contestOptionHtml = "<option value=\"" + contests[i]["id"] + "\">"
                                    + contests[i]["id"] + " - " + contests[i]["name"] + "</option>";
                            contestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                            popupContestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                        }

                        contestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#blogEntry-50978-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#blogEntry-50978-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        popupContestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-50978-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-50978-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");
                    } else {
                        alert("Can't receive contest list");
                    }
                }, "json");
            }

            return false;
        });
    });
</script>



        <span style="position:absolute;right:0;top:0.05em;margin-right:1em;display:inline;font-size:0.75em;">
            <div style="margin-top:0.25em;">
            </div>
        </span>
    </div>

    <div class="content">
        <div class="ttypography"><p>Hello, Codeforces!</p><p>Tomorrow, in <a href="https://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?msg=Codeforces+Round+%23404+%28Div.+2%29&amp;iso=20170315T1805&amp;p1=166&amp;ah=2">March 15, 2017 at 18:05 MSK</a> a regular <strong>rated</strong> Codeforces round for participants from the second division will take place. As usual, participants from the first division can take part out of competition. It's my second contest and I hope you'll like it more than my <a href="http://codeforces.com/contest/734/">previous one</a>.</p><p>As usual, there will be five problems on the contest and two hours to solve them. I advice you to read all the problems' statements <strong>attentively</strong>. Also check all your solutions for correctness even if they passed all the pretests. Verdict <b><font color="#008000">Pretests passed</font></b> doesn't mean that the solution is completely correct! I wish you to enjoy the contest and learn something new solving the problems.</p><p>Like in the last time, the problems will be about Anton and his friends.</p><p>Great thanks to Alexey Vistyazh (<a class="rated-user user-orange" href="/profile/netman" title="Master netman">netman</a>) for help in preparing the contest, Vladislav Vishnevsky (<a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/Vladik" title="Candidate Master Vladik">Vladik</a>) for testing the round, Dmitry Klebanov (<a class="rated-user user-cyan" href="/profile/dakdima" title="Specialist dakdima">dakdima</a>) for reading the statements carefully, and of course, Mike Mirzayanov (<a class="rated-user user-admin" href="/profile/MikeMirzayanov" title="Headquarters, MikeMirzayanov">MikeMirzayanov</a>) for the great platforms <a href="http://codeforces.com">Codeforces</a> and <a href="http://polygon.codeforces.com">Polygon</a>.</p><p><strong>Scoring distribution</strong> is 500 — 1000 — 1500 — <strong>2250</strong> — 2500.</p><p><strong>UPD.</strong> The contest is over, system testing has already started, the editorial will appear soon.</p><p><strong>UPD2.</strong> <a href="http://codeforces.com/blog/entry/50996">Editorial</a> has arrived.</p><p><strong>UPD3.</strong> Congratulations to the winners of the contest!</p><h1>Div. 1</h1> <ol>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/uwi" title="International Grandmaster uwi">uwi</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-orange" href="/profile/rajat1603" title="International master rajat1603">rajat1603</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-orange" href="/profile/SaSa" title="International master SaSa">SaSa</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-violet" href="/profile/mr.banana" title="Candidate Master mr.banana">mr.banana</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-red" href="/profile/Kaban-5" title="Grandmaster Kaban-5">Kaban-5</a></li> </ol><h1>Div. 2</h1> <ol>   <li><a class="rated-user user-green" href="/profile/liu_cheng_ao" title="Pupil liu_cheng_ao">liu_cheng_ao</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/Gauss" title="Expert Gauss">Gauss</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/binsjl" title="Expert binsjl">binsjl</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/hotwater" title="Expert hotwater">hotwater</a></li>   <li><a class="rated-user user-blue" href="/profile/mister_dudec" title="Expert mister_dudec">mister_dudec</a></li> </ol><p>Thanks everyone for participating :)</p></div><p><a href="/blog/entry/50978">Read more »</a></p>
    </div>

    <div style="font-size: 1.1rem;line-height: 1.1rem;padding-bottom: 0.5em;">
    <img src="http://st.codeforces.com/s/91331/images/icons/paperclip-16x16.png" style="vertical-align: middle;"/> <span style="padding: 0 0.35em;">Announcement of <a href="/contest/785" class="notice" style="text-decoration: none;">Codeforces Round #404 (Div. 2)</a></span>
    </div>

        <div class="right-meta">

        $(document).ready(function () {
    $(".topic-vote-up-51213").click(function () {
        $.post("/data/topic/vote", {topicId: 51213, _tta: Codeforces.tta(), topicRevisionId: 116426, vote: +1}, function(data) {
            Codeforces.showMessage(data);
        }, "json");

<div class="topic" topicId="51217">
    <div class="title">
            <a href="/blog/entry/50982">            <p>New on Codeforces: Enter with Facebook</p>
</a>
    </div>

    <div class="info" style="position:relative;">
            By&nbsp;<a href="/profile/kuviman" title="Master kuviman" class="rated-user user-orange">kuviman</a>,
            <span class="format-humantime" title="Mar/14/2017 18:33">2 weeks ago</span>,
            translation,
            <img style="position: relative;top: 5px;" src="http://st.codeforces.com/s/91331/images/flags/24/gb.png" alt="In English" title="In English"/>,

<a class="attach-blogEntry-50982-to-contest-link" href="#"><img src="http://st.codeforces.com/s/91331/images/icons/paperclip-16x16.png" title="Attach this blog to some contest as a resource"/></a>

<style type="text/css">
    .attach-blogEntry-50982-to-contest-form tr:not(:last-of-type) td {
        padding-bottom: 1em;
    }

    .blogEntry-50982-error {
        font-size: 1.1rem;
    }
</style>

<div class="attach-blogEntry-50982-to-contest-form-holder" style="display: none;padding: 1em;margin: 1em;">
    <form class="attach-blogEntry-50982-to-contest-form" method="post"><input type='hidden' name='csrf_token' value='9bfdd3fcd86207d26af3d0df82b7a3cf'/>
        <table style="width: 100%;">
            <thead>
            </thead>
            <tbody>
        <tr class="subscription-row blogEntry-50982-blogId-error blogEntry-50982-error">
            <td>&nbsp;</td>
        <td colspan="2"><div class="shiftUp">        <span class="error for__blogEntry-50982-blogId">-</span>
</div></td>
        </tr>
            <tr>
                <td style="width: 30%;"><label for="blogEntry-50982-contestId">Contest:</label></td>
                <td>
                    <select id="blogEntry-50982-contestId" name="contestId" style="width: 100%;float: left;" disabled>
                        <option value=""></option>
                    </select>
                </td>
                <td>
                    <img id="blogEntry-50982-contestId-loading-indicator" src="http://st.codeforces.com/s/91331/images/indicator.gif"/>
                </td>
            </tr>
        <tr class="subscription-row blogEntry-50982-contestId-error blogEntry-50982-error">
            <td>&nbsp;</td>
        <td colspan="2"><div class="shiftUp">        <span class="error for__blogEntry-50982-contestId">-</span>
</div></td>
        </tr>
            <tr>
                <td style="width: 30%;"><label for="blogEntry-50982-resourceType">Type:</label></td>
                <td>
                    <select id="blogEntry-50982-resourceType" name="resourceType" style="width: 100%;">
                        <option value="" selected></option>
                        <option value="STATEMENT">statements</option>
                        <option value="TUTORIAL">tutorial</option>
                        <option value="ANNOUNCEMENT">announcement</option>
                        <option value="DISCUSSION">discussion</option>
                    </select>
                </td>
                <td></td>
            </tr>
        <tr class="subscription-row blogEntry-50982-resourceType-error blogEntry-50982-error">
            <td>&nbsp;</td>
        <td colspan="2"><div class="shiftUp">        <span class="error for__blogEntry-50982-resourceType">-</span>
</div></td>
        </tr>
            <tr>
                <td colspan="2" style="text-align: center;">
                    <input type="submit" id="blogEntry-50982-resource-submit" value="Attach" disabled
                           style="padding: 0.25em 0.5em;margin: 1em;width: 8em;"/>
                </td>
                <td>
                    <img id="blogEntry-50982-resource-submitting-indicator" src="http://st.codeforces.com/s/91331/images/indicator.gif"
                         style="display: none;"/>
                </td>
            </tr>
            </tbody>
        </table>
    </form>
