<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $(".blogEntry-50982-error").hide();

        $(".attach-blogEntry-50982-to-contest-link").click(function () {
            Codeforces.facebox(".attach-blogEntry-50982-to-contest-form-holder", "http://st.codeforces.com/s/91331");

            $("#facebox .attach-blogEntry-50982-to-contest-form").submit(function () {
                if ($(this).find(":disabled").length === 0) {
                    $("#facebox .blogEntry-50982-error").hide();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-50982-resource-submitting-indicator").show();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-50982-resource-submit").attr("disabled", "disabled");

                    //noinspection JSUnusedGlobalSymbols
                    $.post("/data/blogAndContest?action=attachBlogToContest", {
                        blogId:"48060", contestId:$("#facebox #blogEntry-50982-contestId").val(),
                        blogEntryId:"50982",
                        resourceType:$("#facebox #blogEntry-50982-resourceType").val()
                    }, function (json) {
                        var validated = true;

                        for (var key in json) {
                            if (json.hasOwnProperty(key) && key.indexOf("error__") === 0) {
                                validated = false;
                                $("#facebox .blogEntry-50982-" + key.substring("error__".length) + "-error").show();
                                $("#facebox .for__blogEntry-50982-" + key.substring("error__".length)).text(json[key]);
                            }
                        }

                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-50982-resource-submitting-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-50982-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        if (validated) {
                            $.facebox.close();
                            if (json["success"] === "true") {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("Blog has been successfully attached to selected contest");
                            } else {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("There is unexpected error while attaching blog to the contest");
                            }
                        }
                    }, "json");
                }

                return false;
            });

            var contestSelect = $("#blogEntry-50982-contestId");
            var popupContestSelect = $("#facebox #blogEntry-50982-contestId");

            if (popupContestSelect.is(":disabled")) {
                $.post("/data/contests?action=getContestListWithEditableResources", function (data) {
                    if (data["result"] === "success") {
                        var contests = data["contests"];

                        for (var i = 0, contestCount = contests.length; i < contestCount; ++i) {
                            //noinspection StringLiteralBreaksHTMLJS
                            var contestOptionHtml = "<option value=\"" + contests[i]["id"] + "\">"
                                    + contests[i]["id"] + " - " + contests[i]["name"] + "</option>";
                            contestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                            popupContestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                        }

                        contestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#blogEntry-50982-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#blogEntry-50982-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        popupContestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-50982-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-50982-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");
                    } else {
                        alert("Can't receive contest list");
                    }
                }, "json");
            }

            return false;
        });
    });
</script>



        <span style="position:absolute;right:0;top:0.05em;margin-right:1em;display:inline;font-size:0.75em;">
            <div style="margin-top:0.25em;">
            </div>
        </span>
    </div>

    <div class="content">
        <div class="ttypography"><p>Hello everyone!</p><p>It looks like there are a lot of Facebook users on Codeforces. But they could not easily authorize with their Facebook account until now. Well, now they can!</p><p>You can connect your Codeforces account with your Facebook account on profile settings page:</p><p><img alt=" " src="http://codeforces.com/predownloaded/a7/65/a765e1f4bb87cf1aa19fec7bd86c48b00261569e.png" style="max-width: 100.0%;max-height: 100.0%;" /></p><p>Just click the connect/update button, allow Codeforces to have access and save settings.</p><p>Besides that method, you can also connect your accounts while authorizing — if your Facebook account is not yet connected, you will be asked to either create a new account or to connect it with existing one.</p><p><img alt=" " src="http://codeforces.com/predownloaded/4a/61/4a61f3559c933d616c43cf7f9a60af472e1755f2.png" style="max-width: 100.0%;max-height: 100.0%;" /></p><p>To connect with an existing account you will need to log in using already known method.</p><p><img alt=" " src="http://codeforces.com/predownloaded/18/a2/18a29b1bdfdb752994fd5fd7a14fe51a7a86aaf4.png" style="max-width: 100.0%;max-height: 100.0%;" /></p></div><p><a href="/blog/entry/50982">Read more »</a></p>
    </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $(".blogEntry-50950-error").hide();

        $(".attach-blogEntry-50950-to-contest-link").click(function () {
            Codeforces.facebox(".attach-blogEntry-50950-to-contest-form-holder", "http://st.codeforces.com/s/91331");

            $("#facebox .attach-blogEntry-50950-to-contest-form").submit(function () {
                if ($(this).find(":disabled").length === 0) {
                    $("#facebox .blogEntry-50950-error").hide();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-50950-resource-submitting-indicator").show();
                    $("#facebox #blogEntry-50950-resource-submit").attr("disabled", "disabled");

                    //noinspection JSUnusedGlobalSymbols
                    $.post("/data/blogAndContest?action=attachBlogToContest", {
                        blogId:"11391", contestId:$("#facebox #blogEntry-50950-contestId").val(),
                        blogEntryId:"50950",
                        resourceType:$("#facebox #blogEntry-50950-resourceType").val()
                    }, function (json) {
                        var validated = true;

                        for (var key in json) {
                            if (json.hasOwnProperty(key) && key.indexOf("error__") === 0) {
                                validated = false;
                                $("#facebox .blogEntry-50950-" + key.substring("error__".length) + "-error").show();
                                $("#facebox .for__blogEntry-50950-" + key.substring("error__".length)).text(json[key]);
                            }
                        }

                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-50950-resource-submitting-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-50950-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        if (validated) {
                            $.facebox.close();
                            if (json["success"] === "true") {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("Blog has been successfully attached to selected contest");
                            } else {
                                Codeforces.showMessage("There is unexpected error while attaching blog to the contest");
                            }
                        }
                    }, "json");
                }

                return false;
            });

            var contestSelect = $("#blogEntry-50950-contestId");
            var popupContestSelect = $("#facebox #blogEntry-50950-contestId");

            if (popupContestSelect.is(":disabled")) {
                $.post("/data/contests?action=getContestListWithEditableResources", function (data) {
                    if (data["result"] === "success") {
                        var contests = data["contests"];

                        for (var i = 0, contestCount = contests.length; i < contestCount; ++i) {
                            //noinspection StringLiteralBreaksHTMLJS
                            var contestOptionHtml = "<option value=\"" + contests[i]["id"] + "\">"
                                    + contests[i]["id"] + " - " + contests[i]["name"] + "</option>";
                            contestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                            popupContestSelect.append(contestOptionHtml);
                        }

                        contestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#blogEntry-50950-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#blogEntry-50950-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");

                        popupContestSelect.removeAttr("disabled");
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-50950-contestId-loading-indicator").hide();
                        $("#facebox #blogEntry-50950-resource-submit").removeAttr("disabled");
                    } else {
                        alert("Can't receive contest list");
                    }
                }, "json");
            }

            return false;
        });
    });
</script>



        <span style="position:absolute;right:0;top:0.05em;margin-right:1em;display:inline;font-size:0.75em;">
            <div style="margin-top:0.25em;">
            </div>
        </span>
    </div>

    <div class="content">
        <div class="ttypography"><h2>Hello, Codeforces!</h2><h1><img alt=" " src="http://codeforces.com/predownloaded/ab/3e/ab3e0a8c6f5552b5ba6ee44621653b71519be012.jpg" style="max-width: 100.0%;max-height: 100.0%;" /></h1><p>In the lead-up to the ACM-ICPC World Finals we invite everyone to participate in <strong>Moscow Pre-Finals ACM ICPC Workshop</strong>, that will be held <strong>10-17 of April 2017</strong> at the campus of the Moscow Institute of Physics and Technology ( MIPT). The event is organized by one of the leading Russian universities, MIPT and ITMO.</p><p>The Moscow Pre-Finals ACM ICPC Workshop is the unique event in the world of competitive programming. Every year teams from 20 different countries from Europe, Asia and the USA meet at one platform. Many teams participated in this Workshop turn out to be the prize-winners and winners of the the ACM-ICPC World Finals. In 2016 8 out of 13 teams that were awarded medals at the Finals took part in the Moscow Pre-Finals Workshop ACM ICPC at MIPT. </p><p>This year the organisators have made possible <strong>the remote participation</strong> which includes: 2 consultations (1,5 hour each); access to the contests; access to the contest-analysis; electronic certificate for the team; the lower price: the cost for one teams is 1300$. If you want to participate remotely or you have any questions, write here: <a href="mailto:acm@phystech.edu">acm@phystech.edu</a></p><p>The Workshop is going to be held in accordance with the two divisions scheme. We invite finalists to participate in the first division (Div.A) and other teams who want to train before the next season in the second division (Div.B). The official language is English.</p><p>The participation cost for one person is $590. The cost includes the full curriculum, food and accommodation at the MIPT campus, as well as the sports and sightseeing schedules on days-off. Registration is <a href="https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeIjM5SSLuzli2xCKXe39rCv2stV6i6o_bLBAwLKw150Y7oPQ/viewform">here</a></p><p>Also, before the Workshops, we invite <strong>the teams of division B</strong> to participate for free in the <a href="https://contest.yandex.ru/mipt17spring/contest/4164/enter/">contest</a>, which gives you <strong>the discount on participation</strong> in Moscow Pre-Finals ACM ICPC Workshop! (1st place — 50% ; 2nd place — 30%; 3d place — 20%)</p><p><strong>UPD</strong> Thanks to all the participants and our congratulations to the winners!</p><p><strong>1</strong> Samara U 2 </p><p><strong>2</strong> Lords of (the) Homeless </p><p><strong>3</strong> Daddys </p></div><p><a href="/blog/entry/50950">Read more »</a></p>
    </div>


        <div style="font-size: 1.1rem;line-height: 11px;">
            <img style="vertical-align: middle;" src="http://st.codeforces.com/s/91331/images/blog/tags.png" title="Tags" alt="Tags"/>
                <span style="padding: 0 0.35em;">
    <a href="/search?query=%2523contest" class="tag notice" style="text-decoration: none;">#contest</a>,
                </span>
                <span style="padding: 0 0.35em;">
    <a href="/search?query=mipt" class="tag notice" style="text-decoration: none;">mipt</a>,
                </span>
                <span style="padding: 0 0.35em;">

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(document).ready(function () {
    $(".topic-vote-up-51185").click(function () {
        $.post("/data/topic/vote", {topicId: 51185, _tta: Codeforces.tta(), topicRevisionId: 116708, vote: +1}, function(data) {
            Codeforces.showMessage(data);
        }, "json");
        return false;
    });
    $(".topic-vote-down-51185").click(function () {
        $.post("/data/topic/vote", {topicId: 51185, _tta: Codeforces.tta(), topicRevisionId: 116708, vote: -1}, function(data) {
            Codeforces.showMessage(data);
        }, "json");
        return false;
    });
        });
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(document).ready(function () {
function handlePaginationKeyboardEvent(right) {
    var pageIndex = parseInt($(".pagination").find("span.active").attr("pageIndex"));
    if (right) {
        pageIndex++;
    } else {
        pageIndex--;
    }
    $(".pagination").find("span[pageIndex=" + pageIndex + "]").each(function () {
        Codeforces.redirect($(this).find("a").attr("href"));
    });
}
$(document).keydown(function (e) {
     var code = (e.keyCode ? e.keyCode : e.which);
     if (e.ctrlKey) {
        if (code == 37 || code == 39) {
            handlePaginationKeyboardEvent(code == 39);
        }
     }
});
        });
    </script>                </div>

        <script type="text/javascript">
            $(function() {
                $(".switchToMobile").click(function() {
                    Codeforces.redirect(Codeforces.updateUrlParameter(document.location.href, "mobile", "true"));
                    return false;
                });
                $(".switchToDesktop").click(function() {
                    Codeforces.redirect(Codeforces.updateUrlParameter(document.location.href, "mobile", "false"));
                    return false;
                });
            });
        </script>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(document).ready(function () {
            if ($(window).width() < 1600) {
                $('.button-up').css('width', '30px').css('line-height', '30px').css('font-size', '20px');
            }

            if ($(window).width() >= 1200) {
                $ (window).scroll (function () {
                    if ($ (this).scrollTop () > 100) {
                        $ ('.button-up').fadeIn();
                    } else {
                        $ ('.button-up').fadeOut();
                    }
                });

                $('.button-up').click(function () {
                    $('body,html').animate({
                        scrollTop: 0
                    }, 500);
                    return false;
                });

                $('.button-up').hover(function () {
                    $(this).animate({
                        'opacity':'1'
                    }).css({'background-color':'#e7ebf0','color':'#6a86a4'});
                }, function () {
                    $(this).animate({
                        'opacity':'0.7'
                    }).css({'background':'none','color':'#d3dbe4'});;
                });
            }
            Codeforces.focusOnError();
        });
    </script>

<div class="datatable"
     
     style="background-color: #E1E1E1; padding-bottom: 3px;">
            <div class="lt">&nbsp;</div>

                    <span class="filter" style="display:none;">
                        <img class="opened" src="http://st.codeforces.com/s/91331/images/icons/control-270.png"/>
                        <input style="padding:0;position:relative;bottom:2px;border:1px solid #aaa;height:17px;font-size:1.3rem;"/>
                    </span>

            <div class="irt">&nbsp;</div>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(document).ready(function () {
                // Create new ':containsIgnoreCase' selector for search
                jQuery.expr[':'].containsIgnoreCase = function(a, i, m) {
                    return jQuery(a).text().toUpperCase()
                            .indexOf(m[3].toUpperCase()) >= 0;
                };

                if (window.updateDatatableFilter == undefined) {
                    window.updateDatatableFilter = function(i) {
                        var parent = $(i).parent().parent().parent().parent();
                        $("tr.no-items", parent).remove();
                        $("tr", parent).hide().removeClass('visible');
                        var text = $(i).val();
                        if (text) {
                            $("tr" + ":containsIgnoreCase('" + text + "')", parent).show().addClass('visible');
                        } else {
                            parent.find(".rowCount").text("");
                            $("tr", parent).show().addClass('visible');
                        }

                        var found = false;
                        var visibleRowCount = 0;
                        $("tr", parent).each(function () {
                            if (!found) {
                                if ($(this).find("th").size() > 0) {
                                    $(this).show().addClass('visible');
                                    found = true;
                                }
                            }
                            if ($(this).hasClass('visible')) {
                                visibleRowCount++;
                            }
                        });
                        if (text) {
                            parent.find(".rowCount").text("Matches: " + (visibleRowCount - (found ? 1 : 0)));
                        }
                        if (visibleRowCount == (found ? 1 : 0)) {
                            $("<tr class='no-items visible'><td style=\"text-align:left;\"colspan=\"32\">No items<\/td><\/tr>").appendTo($(parent).find('table'));
                        }
                        $(parent).find("tr td").removeClass("dark");
                        $(parent).find("tr.visible:odd td").addClass("dark");
                    }

                    $(".datatable .closed").click(function () {
                        var parent = $(this).parent();
                        $(this).hide();
                        $(".filter", parent).fadeIn(function () {
                            $("input", parent).val("").focus().css("border", "1px solid #aaa");
                        });
                    });

                    $(".datatable .opened").click(function () {
                        var parent = $(this).parent().parent();
                        $(".filter", parent).fadeOut(function () {
                            $(".closed", parent).show();
                            $("input", parent).val("").each(function () {
                                window.updateDatatableFilter(this);
                            });
                        });
                    });

                    $(".datatable .filter input").keyup(function(e) {
                        window.updateDatatableFilter(this);
                        e.preventDefault();
                        e.stopPropagation();
                    });

                    $(".datatable table").each(function () {
                        var found = false;
                        $("tr", this).each(function () {
                            if (!found && $(this).find("th").size() == 0) {
                                found = true;
                            }
                        });
                        if (!found) {
                            $("<tr class='no-items visible'><td style=\"text-align:left;\"colspan=\"32\">No items<\/td><\/tr>").appendTo(this);
                        }
                    });

                    // Applies styles to datatables.
                    $(".datatable").each(function () {
                        $(this).find("tr:first th").addClass("top");
                        $(this).find("tr:last td").addClass("bottom");
                        $(this).find("tr:odd td").addClass("dark");
                        $(this).find("tr td:first-child, tr th:first-child").addClass("left");
                        $(this).find("tr td:last-child, tr th:last-child").addClass("right");
                    });

                    $(".datatable table.tablesorter").each(function () {
                        $(this).bind("sortEnd", function () {
                            $(".datatable").each(function () {
                                $(this).find("th, td")
                                    .removeClass("top").removeClass("bottom")
                                    .removeClass("left").removeClass("right")
                                    .removeClass("dark");
                                $(this).find("tr:first th").addClass("top");
                                $(this).find("tr:last td").addClass("bottom");
                                $(this).find("tr:odd td").addClass("dark");
                                $(this).find("tr td:first-child, tr th:first-child").addClass("left");
                                $(this).find("tr td:last-child, tr th:last-child").addClass("right");
                            });
                        });
                    });
                }
        });
    </script>
            </div>
        </div>
        <script type="application/javascript">
            $(function() {
                $(".userListMarker").click(function() {
                    $.post("/data/lists", {action: "findTouched"}, function(json) {
                        Codeforces.facebox(".userListsFacebox");
                        var tbody = $("#facebox tbody");
                        tbody.empty();
                        for (var i in json) {
                            tbody.append(
                                    $("<tr></tr>").append(
                                            $("<td></td>").attr("data-readKey", json[i].readKey).text(json[i].name)
                                    )
                            );
                        }
                        Codeforces.updateDatatables();
                        tbody.find("td").css("cursor", "pointer").click(function() {
                            document.location = Codeforces.updateUrlParameter(document.location.href, "list", $(this).attr("data-readKey"));
                        });
                    }, "json");
                });
            });
        </script>
</body>

            ga.async = true;
            ga.src = (document.location.protocol == 'https:' ?
                      'https://ssl' : 'http://www') + '.google-analytics.com/ga.js';
            var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
            s.parentNode.insertBefore(ga, s);
          })();
        </script>
<script type="text/javascript">function a(){var b=window.location.href,c=b.split("?");switch(c.length){case 1:return b+"?m=1";case 2:return 0<=c[1].search("(^|&)m=")?null:b+"&m=1";default:return null}}var d=navigator.userAgent;if(-1!=d.indexOf("Mobile")&&-1!=d.indexOf("WebKit")&&-1==d.indexOf("iPad")||-1!=d.indexOf("Opera Mini")||-1!=d.indexOf("IEMobile")){var e=a();e&&window.location.replace(e)};
</script></head>
<body class='loading'>
<div class='navbar section' id='navbar' name='Navbar'><div class='widget Navbar' data-version='1' id='Navbar1'><script type="text/javascript">
    function setAttributeOnload(object, attribute, val) {
      if(window.addEventListener) {
        window.addEventListener('load',
          function(){ object[attribute] = val; }, false);
      } else {
        window.attachEvent('onload', function(){ object[attribute] = val; });
      }
    }
  </script>
<div id="navbar-iframe-container"></div>
<script type="text/javascript" src="https://apis.google.com/js/plusone.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">
      gapi.load("gapi.iframes:gapi.iframes.style.bubble", function() {
        if (gapi.iframes && gapi.iframes.getContext) {
          gapi.iframes.getContext().openChild({
              url: 'https://www.blogger.com/navbar.g?targetBlogID\x3d9078703298230476588\x26blogName\x3dPROGRAMA+MOMENTO+DO+PRESIDI%C3%81RIO\x26publishMode\x3dPUBLISH_MODE_BLOGSPOT\x26navbarType\x3dLIGHT\x26layoutType\x3dLAYOUTS\x26searchRoot\x3dhttp://programamomentodopresidiario.blogspot.com/search\x26blogLocale\x3dpt_BR\x26v\x3d2\x26homepageUrl\x3dhttp://programamomentodopresidiario.blogspot.com/\x26vt\x3d4527666304974963503',

              id: "navbar-iframe"
          });
        }
      });
    </script><script type="text/javascript">
(function() {
var script = document.createElement('script');
script.type = 'text/javascript';

<div class='main section' id='main' name='Principal'><div class='widget Blog' data-version='1' id='Blog1'>
<div class='blog-posts hfeed'>

                                        <div class="date-outer">
                                      
<h2 class='date-header'>
<span>
25 de fevereiro de 2017
</span>
</h2>

                                        <div class="date-posts">
                                      
<div class='post-outer'>
<div class='post hentry uncustomized-post-template' itemprop='blogPost' itemscope='itemscope' itemtype='http://schema.org/BlogPosting'>
<meta content='https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-U4RLUQ6FtnI/WK1-tsv46cI/AAAAAAAAFAA/KWKKqxcLfEcIgcA0lhi2pqTRqg3SPH8TACEw/s200/DSC09911.JPG' itemprop='image_url'/>
<meta content='9078703298230476588' itemprop='blogId'/>
<meta content='6695019560622014794' itemprop='postId'/>
<a name='6695019560622014794'></a>
<h3 class='post-title entry-title' itemprop='name'>
<a href='http://programamomentodopresidiario.blogspot.com.br/2017/02/esposas-de-pastores-da-universal-vao.html'>
Esposas de Pastores da Universal vão parar em Presídio na Paraíba
</a>
</h3>
<div class='post-header'>
<div class='post-header-line-1'></div>
</div>
<div class='post-body entry-content' id='post-body-6695019560622014794' itemprop='articleBody'>
<div class="separator" style="clear: both; text-align: center;">
</div>
<a href="https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-pvhsBD0Jncg/WK1-ub85OpI/AAAAAAAAE_4/DGmwagC60t4a30aDIFoWuIF4uwkyETH1ACLcB/s1600/DSC09935%2B2.JPG" imageanchor="1" style="clear: right; float: right; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-left: 1em;"></a><br />
<div class="separator" style="clear: both; text-align: center;">
<a href="https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-U4RLUQ6FtnI/WK1-tsv46cI/AAAAAAAAFAA/KWKKqxcLfEcIgcA0lhi2pqTRqg3SPH8TACEw/s1600/DSC09911.JPG" imageanchor="1" style="clear: right; float: right; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-left: 1em;"><img border="0" height="200" src="https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-U4RLUQ6FtnI/WK1-tsv46cI/AAAAAAAAFAA/KWKKqxcLfEcIgcA0lhi2pqTRqg3SPH8TACEw/s200/DSC09911.JPG" width="158" /></a><a href="https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-pvhsBD0Jncg/WK1-ub85OpI/AAAAAAAAE_4/DGmwagC60t4a30aDIFoWuIF4uwkyETH1ACLcB/s1600/DSC09935%2B2.JPG" imageanchor="1" style="clear: left; float: left; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img border="0" height="192" src="https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-pvhsBD0Jncg/WK1-ub85OpI/AAAAAAAAE_4/DGmwagC60t4a30aDIFoWuIF4uwkyETH1ACLcB/s200/DSC09935%2B2.JPG" width="200" /></a><span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">A tarde desta última sexta-feira foi marcada pela visita especial de esposas de pastores ao presídio feminino Julia Maranhão, em João Pessoa (PB). Nessa unidade são mais de 400 reeducandas. </span></div>
<div class="separator" style="clear: both; text-align: center;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">No início da visita, ainda no corredor, todas receberam uma oração e a direção para entregar suas vidas a Jesus. Logo depois, as que são preparadas para servir a Deus foram chamadas. </span></div>
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="tr-caption-container" style="float: left; margin-right: 1em; text-align: left;"><tbody>
<tr><td style="text-align: center;"><a href="https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-MMBZ4f4hN4c/WK1-tn2vFeI/AAAAAAAAFAA/-oRHnk6N2Mwg1x6TWCavyDtTXrNR1UNrACEw/s1600/DSC09920.JPG" imageanchor="1" style="clear: left; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;"><img border="0" height="161" src="https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-MMBZ4f4hN4c/WK1-tn2vFeI/AAAAAAAAFAA/-oRHnk6N2Mwg1x6TWCavyDtTXrNR1UNrACEw/s200/DSC09920.JPG" width="200" /></a></td></tr>
<tr><td class="tr-caption" style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-size: xx-small;">Joselice Repolho</span><br />
<span style="font-size: xx-small;">responsável da UNP Feminino na Paraíba,</span><br />
<span style="font-size: xx-small;">se preparando para reunião dentro do presídio.</span><span style="font-size: x-small;"> </span></td></tr>
</tbody></table>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<a href="https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-fTjI15TnB5g/WK1-ti6E_SI/AAAAAAAAE_s/7E6U1vd5DzorGdLJsMOiE6XxzdX9Sj2gQCEw/s1600/DSC09883.JPG" imageanchor="1" style="clear: right; float: right; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-left: 1em;"><span style="font-size: x-small;"><img border="0" height="150" src="https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-fTjI15TnB5g/WK1-ti6E_SI/AAAAAAAAE_s/7E6U1vd5DzorGdLJsMOiE6XxzdX9Sj2gQCEw/s200/DSC09883.JPG" style="cursor: move;" width="200" /></span></a><span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">Neste momento elas ficam em um lugar separado e</span><span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;"> recebem</span><span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;"> orientações para evangelizar dentro das celas. No total são 52 reeducandas que participam dessa preparação. Os encontros são realizados por Joselice <span id="goog_1571758526"></span><a href="https://www.blogger.com/"></a><span id="goog_1571758527"></span>Repolho, responsável pela UNP Feminino no estado. </span></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">Ao final da visita, as esposas deixaram o local com a certeza de que a semente para uma vida nova foi plantada no coração de cada mulher. E a partir dessa semente muitos frutos irão surgir. </span></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">&nbsp;&#8220;Todas nos receberam muito bem e mostraram grande desejo em conhecer a palavra de Deus e praticá-la. É sempre um privilégio estar com elas.&#8221; &#8211; ressaltou Eliete Repouso Soares, esposa de pastor. </span></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot;;"><a href="https://www.facebook.com/unpfemininooficial/" target="_blank"><br /></a></span></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot;;"><a href="https://www.facebook.com/unpfemininooficial/" target="_blank">Acompanhe o trabalho da UNP Feminino no Brasil</a></span></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot;;"><a href="https://www.facebook.com/bpeduardoguilherme/" target="_blank">Acompanhe o Facebook do Bispo Eduardo Guilherme</a></span><br />
<span style="font-family: Trebuchet MS; font-size: x-small;"><b><i><br /></i></b></span>
<span style="font-family: Trebuchet MS; font-size: x-small;"><b><i>Colaborou UNP PB</i></b></span></div>
<u></u><sub></sub><sup></sup><strike></strike><span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;"></span><br />
<div style="text-align: justify;">
</div>
<div class="separator" style="clear: both; text-align: center;">
<a href="https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-fTjI15TnB5g/WK1-ti6E_SI/AAAAAAAAE_s/7E6U1vd5DzorGdLJsMOiE6XxzdX9Sj2gQCEw/s1600/DSC09883.JPG" imageanchor="1" style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"></a></div>
<b></b><i></i><u></u><sub></sub><sup></sup><strike></strike><br />
<div style='clear: both;'></div>
</div>

<div class='post-footer-line post-footer-line-3'>
<span class='post-location'>
Local:Brasil
<a href='https://maps.google.com/maps?q=Av.+Gen.+Os%C3%B3rio+-+Centro,+Jo%C3%A3o+Pessoa+-+PB,+58010-780,+Brasil@-7.1153942,-34.8843574&z=10' target='_blank'>
Av. Gen. Osório - Centro, João Pessoa - PB, 58010-780, Brasil
</a>
</span>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

                                        </div></div>
                                      

                                        <div class="date-outer">
                                      
<h2 class='date-header'>
<span>
24 de fevereiro de 2017
</span>
</h2>

                                        <div class="date-posts">
                                      
<div class='post-outer'>
<div class='post hentry uncustomized-post-template' itemprop='blogPost' itemscope='itemscope' itemtype='http://schema.org/BlogPosting'>
<meta content='https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-zsw7j5asf_0/WK77wg5A7_I/AAAAAAAAFA4/rINthnppa30khQy7s2DPoeekNxbj5yy_gCEw/s200/Consagra%25C3%25A7%25C3%25A3o%2BJo%25C3%25A3o%2BDias.jpg' itemprop='image_url'/>
<meta content='9078703298230476588' itemprop='blogId'/>
<meta content='3885381205633891561' itemprop='postId'/>
<a name='3885381205633891561'></a>
<h3 class='post-title entry-title' itemprop='name'>
<a href='http://programamomentodopresidiario.blogspot.com.br/2017/02/consagracao-unp-bloco-sul.html'>
Consagração UNP Bloco Sul
</a>
</h3>
<div class='post-header'>
<div class='post-header-line-1'></div>
</div>
<div class='post-body entry-content' id='post-body-3885381205633891561' itemprop='articleBody'>
<div class="separator" style="clear: both; text-align: center;">
<a href="https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-zsw7j5asf_0/WK77wg5A7_I/AAAAAAAAFA4/rINthnppa30khQy7s2DPoeekNxbj5yy_gCEw/s1600/Consagra%25C3%25A7%25C3%25A3o%2BJo%25C3%25A3o%2BDias.jpg" imageanchor="1" style="clear: left; float: left; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img border="0" height="133" src="https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-zsw7j5asf_0/WK77wg5A7_I/AAAAAAAAFA4/rINthnppa30khQy7s2DPoeekNxbj5yy_gCEw/s200/Consagra%25C3%25A7%25C3%25A3o%2BJo%25C3%25A3o%2BDias.jpg" width="200" /></a></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">Na manhã deste domingo (19) o Bispo Darlan D'Avila fez uma oração especial e consagrou os novos voluntários do grupo UNP do Bloco Sul, durante a reunião das 09:30 da manhã na Catedral da João Dias, em Santo Amaro. Na oportunidade ele destacou a importância do trabalho da UNP&nbsp;realizado nos presidiários.</span></div>
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;"></span><br />
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<br /></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<div class="separator" style="clear: both; text-align: center;">
<a href="https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-1z8d739ky4g/WK77wRF6hVI/AAAAAAAAFAw/BZnJFvbsnTc0CG2bKgz2_EFlvsitHui0wCEw/s1600/IMG_2507.jpg" imageanchor="1" style="clear: left; float: left; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img border="0" height="213" src="https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-1z8d739ky4g/WK77wRF6hVI/AAAAAAAAFAw/BZnJFvbsnTc0CG2bKgz2_EFlvsitHui0wCEw/s320/IMG_2507.jpg" width="320" /></a></div>
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;"></span></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<a href="https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wfmU5vQmScw/WK77xErAVcI/AAAAAAAAFBA/ZWYPucVpxW08YrCqxkYo_7OqlyULW5jVgCEw/s1600/IMG_2515.jpg" imageanchor="1" style="clear: right; float: right; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-left: 1em;"><img border="0" height="133" src="https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wfmU5vQmScw/WK77xErAVcI/AAAAAAAAFBA/ZWYPucVpxW08YrCqxkYo_7OqlyULW5jVgCEw/s200/IMG_2515.jpg" width="200" /></a><a href="https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-1z8d739ky4g/WK77wRF6hVI/AAAAAAAAFAw/BZnJFvbsnTc0CG2bKgz2_EFlvsitHui0wCEw/s1600/IMG_2507.jpg" imageanchor="1" style="clear: right; float: right; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-left: 1em;"></a><span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">O bispo ainda pediu doações de Bíblias aos membros da Universal para que as mesmas fossem levadas aos presidiários. Ele ressaltou que a Palavra de Deus dentro da Prisão, é a única esperança que o preso tem de lá dentro, mesmo em meio ao sofrimento, este detento(a) possa ter um verdadeiro encontro com Deus. </span></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot;;"><br /></span></div>
<div class="separator" style="clear: both; text-align: center;">
<a href="https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-9_WdRQ2IJ6M/WK77xKaAnkI/AAAAAAAAFBE/6TtzH45RyfsR1zqoYt_CUPt3AfKlH11DwCEw/s1600/IMG_2539.jpg" imageanchor="1" style="clear: right; float: right; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-left: 1em;"><img border="0" height="111" src="https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-9_WdRQ2IJ6M/WK77xKaAnkI/AAAAAAAAFBE/6TtzH45RyfsR1zqoYt_CUPt3AfKlH11DwCEw/s200/IMG_2539.jpg" width="200" /></a></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<a href="https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-rEIuLuMsSK8/WK77xn_TMKI/AAAAAAAAFBI/hk81WRxaR3k7H2fDecxvQ4CYQMj55POvQCLcB/s1600/IMG_2572.jpg" imageanchor="1" style="clear: left; float: left; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img border="0" height="132" src="https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-rEIuLuMsSK8/WK77xn_TMKI/AAAAAAAAFBI/hk81WRxaR3k7H2fDecxvQ4CYQMj55POvQCLcB/s200/IMG_2572.jpg" width="200" /></a><span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">O Bispo Eduardo Guilherme, responsável pelo trabalho da UNP no Brasil, se reuniu com os os pastores e voluntários do bloco Sul, após a concentração de fé e milagres, para falar da importância de colocarmos ainda mais força neste trabalho, trazendo novos integrantes para realizar o trabalho evangelístico nos presídios.</span></div>
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;"></span><br />
<div style="text-align: justify;">
</div>
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">
</span><b></b><i></i><u></u><sub></sub><sup></sup><strike></strike>
<div>
<div class="separator" style="clear: both; text-align: center;">
<a href="https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-D7ppxMZX6R0/WK77x8RciqI/AAAAAAAAFBM/JFPF19CFkSEJ135PNK19jSx_0xmLIK-zwCEw/s1600/IMG_2578.jpg" imageanchor="1" style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img border="0" height="425" src="https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-D7ppxMZX6R0/WK77x8RciqI/AAAAAAAAFBM/JFPF19CFkSEJ135PNK19jSx_0xmLIK-zwCEw/s640/IMG_2578.jpg" width="640" /></a></div>
<br />
Conheça mais sobre o Bispo Eduardo e o Trabalho da UNP Brasil: <a href="https://www.facebook.com/bpeduardoguilherme" target="_blank">Clique</a><br />
<br />
Acompanhe-nos no Facebook: <a href="https://www.facebook.com/programamomentodopresidiario" target="_blank">Clique</a><br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
<div class="separator" style="clear: both; text-align: center;">
</div>
<a href="https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-rEIuLuMsSK8/WK77xn_TMKI/AAAAAAAAFBI/hk81WRxaR3k7H2fDecxvQ4CYQMj55POvQCLcB/s1600/IMG_2572.jpg" imageanchor="1" style="clear: left; float: left; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"></a><a href="https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-rEIuLuMsSK8/WK77xn_TMKI/AAAAAAAAFBI/hk81WRxaR3k7H2fDecxvQ4CYQMj55POvQCLcB/s1600/IMG_2572.jpg" imageanchor="1" style="clear: left; float: left; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"></a><b></b><i></i><u></u><sub></sub><sup></sup><strike></strike></div>
<iframe allowtransparency="true" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" src="//www.facebook.com/plugins/follow?href=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.facebook.com%2Fprofile.php%3Fid%3D100005361393548&amp;layout=standard&amp;show_faces=true&amp;colorscheme=light&amp;width=450&amp;height=80" style="border: none; height: 80px; overflow: hidden; width: 450px;"></iframe>

<div class='post-outer'>
<div class='post hentry uncustomized-post-template' itemprop='blogPost' itemscope='itemscope' itemtype='http://schema.org/BlogPosting'>
<meta content='https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-XqjX6a7ttd4/WKxWfiN85yI/AAAAAAAAE-0/gOtb6aYm_FIKlZbCtAeBkFjPt6ZMWbA2QCLcB/s200/DSC09814.JPG' itemprop='image_url'/>
<meta content='9078703298230476588' itemprop='blogId'/>
<meta content='4659090219292511714' itemprop='postId'/>
<a name='4659090219292511714'></a>
<h3 class='post-title entry-title' itemprop='name'>
<a href='http://programamomentodopresidiario.blogspot.com.br/2017/02/acao-social-realizada-em-manicomio.html'>
Ação Social Realizada em Manicômio Judiciário da Paraíba
</a>
</h3>
<div class='post-header'>
<div class='post-header-line-1'></div>
</div>
<div class='post-body entry-content' id='post-body-4659090219292511714' itemprop='articleBody'>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">João Pessoa / PB </span></div>
<div class="separator" style="clear: both; text-align: center;">
<a href="https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-XqjX6a7ttd4/WKxWfiN85yI/AAAAAAAAE-0/gOtb6aYm_FIKlZbCtAeBkFjPt6ZMWbA2QCLcB/s1600/DSC09814.JPG" imageanchor="1" style="clear: left; float: left; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img border="0" height="150" src="https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-XqjX6a7ttd4/WKxWfiN85yI/AAAAAAAAE-0/gOtb6aYm_FIKlZbCtAeBkFjPt6ZMWbA2QCLcB/s200/DSC09814.JPG" width="200" /></a></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">Na última sexta-feira, mais uma ação social foi realizada pelo grupo Universal nos Presídios (UNP). Desta vez, aconteceu no Manicômio Judiciário de João Pessoa, na Paraíba. </span><a href="https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-lsIZR340umI/WKxU_L4eVzI/AAAAAAAAE-o/OR6kFpb15-0JukZGW-co_RxPVwnS46lOgCEw/s1600/maninomio.JPG" imageanchor="1" style="clear: right; float: right; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-left: 1em;"><img border="0" height="142" src="https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-lsIZR340umI/WKxU_L4eVzI/AAAAAAAAE-o/OR6kFpb15-0JukZGW-co_RxPVwnS46lOgCEw/s200/maninomio.JPG" width="200" /></a></div>
<a href="https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-obTAHBjwDZA/WKxVG9GpR9I/AAAAAAAAE-o/wnXZS6ec3XoBFFUtHgMxNhr5jUn8d2CqACEw/s1600/DSC09824.JPG" imageanchor="1" style="clear: right; float: right; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-left: 1em;"></a><a href="https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-XhtRvpfdMlI/WKxWgHFbbnI/AAAAAAAAE-8/dIN_D7Z0OCAXKZR0K4aijAagahfvzenNACEw/s1600/DSC09848.JPG" imageanchor="1" style="clear: right; float: right; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-left: 1em;"><img border="0" height="150" src="https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-XhtRvpfdMlI/WKxWgHFbbnI/AAAAAAAAE-8/dIN_D7Z0OCAXKZR0K4aijAagahfvzenNACEw/s200/DSC09848.JPG" width="200" /></a><a href="https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-obTAHBjwDZA/WKxVG9GpR9I/AAAAAAAAE-o/wnXZS6ec3XoBFFUtHgMxNhr5jUn8d2CqACEw/s1600/DSC09824.JPG" imageanchor="1" style="clear: left; float: left; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img border="0" height="150" src="https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-obTAHBjwDZA/WKxVG9GpR9I/AAAAAAAAE-o/wnXZS6ec3XoBFFUtHgMxNhr5jUn8d2CqACEw/s200/DSC09824.JPG" width="200" /></a><br />
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;"></span><br />
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Cerca de 70 internos cortaram os cabelos, a barba e as unhas, verificaram a pressão e receberam atendimento espiritual. Tudo realizado por 15 voluntários da UNP Local. </span></div>
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">
<div style="text-align: justify;">
</div>
<br />
Também&nbsp;esteve presente a &nbsp;assistente social Dra Ana e uma das psiquiatras do local.&nbsp; </span><br />
<div class="separator" style="clear: both; text-align: center;">
</div>
<div class="separator" style="clear: both; text-align: center;">
<a href="https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7JUAedhQzjs/WKxWf2AqotI/AAAAAAAAE-4/JQHTUMXWewY6WKWzQQ7Kk1bEY7jTgAzoQCEw/s1600/DSC09865.JPG" imageanchor="1" style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"></a></div>
<a href="https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7JUAedhQzjs/WKxWf2AqotI/AAAAAAAAE-4/JQHTUMXWewY6WKWzQQ7Kk1bEY7jTgAzoQCEw/s1600/DSC09865.JPG" imageanchor="1" style="clear: left; float: left; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img border="0" height="200" src="https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7JUAedhQzjs/WKxWf2AqotI/AAAAAAAAE-4/JQHTUMXWewY6WKWzQQ7Kk1bEY7jTgAzoQCEw/s200/DSC09865.JPG" width="192" /></a><a href="https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-z6oD78bzlHY/WKxWfXThTwI/AAAAAAAAE-w/4_nwucHhnSk697OQRDiCeYKoWIycdzgpQCEw/s1600/DSC09850.JPG" imageanchor="1" style="clear: right; float: right; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-left: 1em;"><img border="0" height="190" src="https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-z6oD78bzlHY/WKxWfXThTwI/AAAAAAAAE-w/4_nwucHhnSk697OQRDiCeYKoWIycdzgpQCEw/s200/DSC09850.JPG" width="200" /></a><br />
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">Além deste dia especial, a visita realizada pelo grupo acontece semanalmente. Alguns dos que vivem ali foram esquecidos pela própria família, mas quando os voluntários chegam, a alegria contagia a todos.&nbsp; </span></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">O diretor da unidade, Dr Rogério Gomini, e o diretor adjunto, Dr Magno, parabenizaram a ação e agradeceram ao grupo pelo cuidado e apoio que recebem há 3 anos. Cada integrante da UNP PB realiza a ação com amor e carinho. </span></div>
<br />
<br />
<span style="font-size: x-small;"><b><i>Colaborou UNP PB</i></b></span>
<div style='clear: both;'></div>
</div>
<div class='post-footer'>

<a href='https://maps.google.com/maps?q=Av.+Gen.+Os%C3%B3rio+-+Centro,+Jo%C3%A3o+Pessoa+-+PB,+58010-780,+Brasil@-7.1153942,-34.8843574&z=10' target='_blank'>

                                        <div class="date-outer">
                                      
<h2 class='date-header'>
<span>
23 de fevereiro de 2017
</span>
</h2>

                                        <div class="date-posts">
                                      
<div class='post-outer'>
<div class='post hentry uncustomized-post-template' itemprop='blogPost' itemscope='itemscope' itemtype='http://schema.org/BlogPosting'>
<meta content='https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-F-37mnGxxGA/WKxM8pXPAuI/AAAAAAAAE94/zUOjxKPR33snRrk0cbHuGfaslyNd6hGcwCLcB/s200/DSC01659.JPG' itemprop='image_url'/>
<meta content='9078703298230476588' itemprop='blogId'/>
<meta content='5824721438505312250' itemprop='postId'/>
<a name='5824721438505312250'></a>
<h3 class='post-title entry-title' itemprop='name'>
<a href='http://programamomentodopresidiario.blogspot.com.br/2017/02/ate-o-preso-entende.html'>
ATÉ O PRESO ENTENDE
</a>
</h3>
<div class='post-header'>
<div class='post-header-line-1'></div>
</div>
<div class='post-body entry-content' id='post-body-5824721438505312250' itemprop='articleBody'>
<h3 style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;"></span>Quem crer e for batizado será Salvo. Até o preso entende isso</h3>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<a href="https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-F-37mnGxxGA/WKxM8pXPAuI/AAAAAAAAE94/zUOjxKPR33snRrk0cbHuGfaslyNd6hGcwCLcB/s1600/DSC01659.JPG" imageanchor="1" style="clear: right; float: right; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-left: 1em;"></a></div>
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;"></span><br />
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;"><a href="https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-F-37mnGxxGA/WKxM8pXPAuI/AAAAAAAAE94/zUOjxKPR33snRrk0cbHuGfaslyNd6hGcwCLcB/s1600/DSC01659.JPG" imageanchor="1" style="clear: right; float: right; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-left: 1em;"><img border="0" height="150" src="https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-F-37mnGxxGA/WKxM8pXPAuI/AAAAAAAAE94/zUOjxKPR33snRrk0cbHuGfaslyNd6hGcwCLcB/s200/DSC01659.JPG" width="200" /></a>A UNP - Universal Nos Presídios, tem um trabalho continuo dentro das cadeias em todo o Brasil, e onde entra um evangelista, obreiro, pastor ou bispo, entra também a Palavra de Deus e consequentemente a Salvação Eterna. </span></div>
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">
</span>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;"><br /></span></div>
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;">
</span><span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot;;"></span><br />
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<a href="https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-F-37mnGxxGA/WKxM8pXPAuI/AAAAAAAAE94/zUOjxKPR33snRrk0cbHuGfaslyNd6hGcwCLcB/s1600/DSC01659.JPG" imageanchor="1" style="clear: right; float: right; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-left: 1em;"></a><span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot;;">Foi assim com todos os que outrora chegaram aos pés do Senhor Jesus, a saber, Ele mesmo foi batizado para dar o exemplo e começar o seu ministério de Salvação na terra. </span></div>
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot;;"></span><br />
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot;;"><br /></span></div>
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot;;">
</span>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<a href="https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-DlbYNKIAABg/WKxM8p3LnAI/AAAAAAAAE-I/Df527Qd9osQo5da2Q7zezCZ0127_rxc_wCEw/s1600/DSC01669.JPG" imageanchor="1" style="clear: left; float: left; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img border="0" height="320" src="https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-DlbYNKIAABg/WKxM8p3LnAI/AAAAAAAAE-I/Df527Qd9osQo5da2Q7zezCZ0127_rxc_wCEw/s320/DSC01669.JPG" width="280" /></a><a href="https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-wqLROh9Vujo/WKxM8sOoYDI/AAAAAAAAE-I/62hsdi58Xa80EaamjtYegbecV7GTQBWXACEw/s1600/DSC01671.JPG" imageanchor="1" style="clear: right; float: right; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-left: 1em;"></a><span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot;;">&nbsp;E assim vai a UNP, de cadeia em cadeia, pregando o arrependimento e o batismo nas Águas, o preso entende que somente quando se batizam podem ter forças para vencer de forma correta e honesta o dia a dia da prisão. Eles entendem que só Jesus, só se aliando a Ele poderemos tomar posse das armas da fé e vencer todos os desafios não só dentro, mais principalmente fora da prisão. </span></div>
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot;;"></span><br />
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot;;"><br /></span></div>
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot;;">
</span>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<a href="https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-wqLROh9Vujo/WKxM8sOoYDI/AAAAAAAAE-I/62hsdi58Xa80EaamjtYegbecV7GTQBWXACEw/s1600/DSC01671.JPG" imageanchor="1" style="clear: right; float: right; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-left: 1em;"><img border="0" height="201" src="https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-wqLROh9Vujo/WKxM8sOoYDI/AAAAAAAAE-I/62hsdi58Xa80EaamjtYegbecV7GTQBWXACEw/s320/DSC01671.JPG" width="320" /></a><span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot;;"><br /></span></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot;;"><br /></span></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot;;"><br /></span></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot;;"><br /></span></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot;;"><br /></span></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot;;"><br /></span></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot;;"><br /></span></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot;;"><br /></span></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot;;">O Batismo chegou no CDP do Belém SP, onde mais quatro internos desceram às águas atendendo à Pregação feita pelo pastor Marcos Datri e seus companheiros. Para a UNP é uma imensa alegria este acontecimento, pois é o fruto de um trabalho inicial nestas vidas. </span></div>
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot;;"></span><br />
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot;;"><br /></span></div>
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot;;">
</span>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<a href="https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-U3BfzNdHXPU/WKxM9A2HMbI/AAAAAAAAE-I/HIbftSlxBzQlGvwBgcPQlo6XFl2JiBi9ACEw/s1600/DSC01683.JPG" imageanchor="1" style="clear: left; float: left; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img border="0" height="313" src="https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-U3BfzNdHXPU/WKxM9A2HMbI/AAAAAAAAE-I/HIbftSlxBzQlGvwBgcPQlo6XFl2JiBi9ACEw/s320/DSC01683.JPG" width="320" /></a><span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot;;">Você. Decida-se também, entregue sua vida a Deus com a atitude de se batizar nas Águas, isso pode acontecer em uma Universal mais perto de você. </span></div>
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot;;"></span><br />
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot;;"><br /></span></div>
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot;;">
</span>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot;;">Deus abençoe a todos. </span></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot;;"><b><i>UNP - Estais Preso. Nós Vamos te Ver!</i></b></span></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<br /></div>
<div style='clear: both;'></div>
</div>
<div class='post-footer'>

<h3 class='post-title entry-title' itemprop='name'>
<a href='http://programamomentodopresidiario.blogspot.com.br/2017/02/qual-e-sua-sede.html'>
Qual é a sua Sede?
</a>
</h3>
<div class='post-header'>
<div class='post-header-line-1'></div>
</div>
<div class='post-body entry-content' id='post-body-8989591781621356275' itemprop='articleBody'>
<iframe allowfullscreen="" frameborder="0" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Zhqe5wfprXs" width="480"></iframe>
<div style='clear: both;'></div>
</div>

<div class='post-footer-line post-footer-line-1'>

<a class='goog-inline-block share-button sb-email' href='https://www.blogger.com/share-post.g?blogID=9078703298230476588&postID=8989591781621356275&target=email' target='_blank' title='Enviar por e-mail'>

</span>

</span>
</a>

                                        </div></div>
                                      

                                        <div class="date-outer">
                                      
<h2 class='date-header'>
<span>
17 de fevereiro de 2017
</span>
</h2>

                                        <div class="date-posts">
                                      
<div class='post-outer'>
<div class='post hentry uncustomized-post-template' itemprop='blogPost' itemscope='itemscope' itemtype='http://schema.org/BlogPosting'>
<meta content='https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-z8MslixsceU/WKWQrKpYc3I/AAAAAAAAFc4/ZMDhWIjyjx0exf6CJfMZcJk_kf8Y7KjDgCLcB/s200/CADEIA.jpg' itemprop='image_url'/>
<meta content='9078703298230476588' itemprop='blogId'/>
<meta content='1110156300030148837' itemprop='postId'/>
<a name='1110156300030148837'></a>
<h3 class='post-title entry-title' itemprop='name'>
<a href='http://programamomentodopresidiario.blogspot.com.br/2017/02/na-porta-da-cadeia-nao-e-facil.html'>
NA PORTA DA CADEIA NÃO É FÁCIL
</a>
</h3>
<div class='post-header'>
<div class='post-header-line-1'></div>
</div>
<div class='post-body entry-content' id='post-body-1110156300030148837' itemprop='articleBody'>
<div class="separator" style="clear: both; text-align: center;">
</div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<div class="separator" style="clear: both; text-align: center;">
<a href="https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-z8MslixsceU/WKWQrKpYc3I/AAAAAAAAFc4/ZMDhWIjyjx0exf6CJfMZcJk_kf8Y7KjDgCLcB/s1600/CADEIA.jpg" imageanchor="1" style="clear: right; float: right; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-left: 1em;"><img border="0" height="133" src="https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-z8MslixsceU/WKWQrKpYc3I/AAAAAAAAFc4/ZMDhWIjyjx0exf6CJfMZcJk_kf8Y7KjDgCLcB/s200/CADEIA.jpg" width="200" /></a></div>
<span style="font-family: &quot;helvetica neue&quot; , &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;helvetica&quot; , sans-serif;">Na saída dos Presídios, &nbsp;após o dia de visita, os familiares dos internos saem na intenção e na esperança de um dia estar com o seu ente querido de volta, saem com a esperança de mais uma vez, ver a sua família toda reunida outra vez, e gozar de paz finalmente.&nbsp;</span><br />
<span style="font-family: &quot;helvetica neue&quot; , &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;helvetica&quot; , sans-serif;">Só que esta esperança acaba segundos depois de passarem pelo último portão da cadeia, pois é notório o desespero, a dor e a angústia das pessoas que deixam suas familiares dentro de uma unidade prisional. Todos tem em comum a consciência de que o erro deve ser corrigido, de que a "dívida" deve e precisa ser paga, mas a dor e o sofrimento acabam sobrepondo a consciência e assim vem a tristeza e a angústia que fazem o familiar do preso, tão destruído e aprisionado do que o seu familiar.</span><br />
<br />
<div class="separator" style="clear: both; text-align: center;">
<a href="https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-9mLaAt7awBg/WKWPnkoMkOI/AAAAAAAAFc0/T8Gk0XAUUEAxdcGOTj655s42zxqXykamACEw/s1600/099.jpg" imageanchor="1" style="clear: left; float: left; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img border="0" height="200" src="https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-9mLaAt7awBg/WKWPnkoMkOI/AAAAAAAAFc0/T8Gk0XAUUEAxdcGOTj655s42zxqXykamACEw/s200/099.jpg" width="150" /></a></div>
<span style="font-family: &quot;helvetica neue&quot; , &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;helvetica&quot; , sans-serif;">No intuito de ajudar os familiares, a UNP aguarda nas portas dos presídios para falar da palavra de Deus e levar a esses familiares a Fé! Que para eles é a única arma capaz de contra-por a situação que vem destruindo suas vidas.</span><br />
<span style="font-family: &quot;helvetica neue&quot; , &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;helvetica&quot; , sans-serif;"><br /></span>
<a href="https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-99cqUEUbnhk/WKWPoH1HqCI/AAAAAAAAFc0/NqIf0CUXUJwpanRP1nRWYcLaZUNuj84wwCEw/s1600/115.jpg" imageanchor="1" style="clear: right; float: right; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-left: 1em;"><img border="0" height="200" src="https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-99cqUEUbnhk/WKWPoH1HqCI/AAAAAAAAFc0/NqIf0CUXUJwpanRP1nRWYcLaZUNuj84wwCEw/s200/115.jpg" width="150" /></a><span style="font-family: &quot;helvetica neue&quot; , &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;helvetica&quot; , sans-serif;">Nesse domingo, a UNP atendeu os familiares e fizeram oração com aqueles que pediram ajuda, muitas dessas pessoas visitam seu familiar pela primeira vez no CDP da Cidade de São Vicente/SP.</span><br />
<span style="font-family: &quot;helvetica neue&quot; , &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;helvetica&quot; , sans-serif;"><br /></span>
<span style="font-family: &quot;helvetica neue&quot; , &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;helvetica&quot; , sans-serif;">Como uma triste rotina a UNP mais uma vez acompanhou a saída dos familiares dos detentos, &nbsp;e a palavra triste é colocada aqui devido a situação destas pessoas. Elas saem abatidas, sem saber o que irão encontrar na próxima visita e nem mesmo sabem se estarão naquela unidade prisional.</span><br />
<div class="separator" style="clear: both; text-align: center;">
<a href="https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-rXjpGFCE27c/WKWPniL2ynI/AAAAAAAAFc0/M24Dqjou7X8kzBwmVcyjZZPC5FQ7iNQewCEw/s1600/111.jpg" imageanchor="1" style="clear: left; float: left; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img border="0" height="200" src="https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-rXjpGFCE27c/WKWPniL2ynI/AAAAAAAAFc0/M24Dqjou7X8kzBwmVcyjZZPC5FQ7iNQewCEw/s200/111.jpg" width="150" /></a></div>
<span style="font-family: &quot;helvetica neue&quot; , &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;helvetica&quot; , sans-serif;">Para acabar com a tristeza, angústia e falta de esperança, a UNP leva a <a href="http://www.universal.org/folha-universal" target="_blank">Folha Universal</a>, jornal de circulação nacional que traz uma palavra de fé semanalmente aos seus leitores. Os voluntários UNP ainda anotam em um caderno de oração o nome de todos e intercedem pelos mesmos, falam da importância de estarem participando das reuniões da Universal para que eles venham se fortalecer e poder ajudar os seus familiares ainda no cárcere.</span></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<a href="https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-tXfWCEFf3nA/WKWPnnGva3I/AAAAAAAAFc0/mR4gvL-h9aQvNVYOEcozwCb1swmMvP92QCEw/s1600/105.jpg" imageanchor="1" style="clear: right; float: right; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-left: 1em;"><img border="0" height="200" src="https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-tXfWCEFf3nA/WKWPnnGva3I/AAAAAAAAFc0/mR4gvL-h9aQvNVYOEcozwCb1swmMvP92QCEw/s200/105.jpg" width="150" /></a><span style="font-family: &quot;helvetica neue&quot; , &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;helvetica&quot; , sans-serif;">A UNP explica a essas pessoas tão preciosas para Deus, que o Espírito Santo é o único que pode consolar nesse momento tão difícil de suas vidas, é Ele que dá o conforto que precisam para enfrentar todos os desafios da longa caminhada na rotina do cárcere.</span></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif;"><br /></span>
<span style="font-family: &quot;verdana&quot; , sans-serif;">E assim, a UNP deixa uma mensagem para todos:</span></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;verdana&quot; , sans-serif;"><br /></span><span style="font-family: &quot;verdana&quot; , sans-serif;">&#8220;Elevo os meus olhos para os montes; de onde me vem o socorro? O meu socorro vem do Senhor, que fez os céus e a terra. Salmos 121.1-2</span><br />
<span style="font-family: &quot;verdana&quot; , sans-serif;"><br /></span>
<span style="color: #999999; font-family: &quot;verdana&quot; , sans-serif; font-size: x-small;"><b>Colaborou UNP Baixada Santista</b></span><br />
<span style="font-family: &quot;verdana&quot; , sans-serif;">Acompanhe o trabalho da UNP através das nossas redes sociais:</span><br />
<span style="font-family: &quot;verdana&quot; , sans-serif;"><br /></span>
<span style="font-family: &quot;verdana&quot; , sans-serif;"><a href="http://facebook.com/bpeduardoguilherme" target="_blank">Bispo Eduardo Guilherme (Resp. UNP Brasil)</a></span><br />
<a href="https://www.facebook.com/programamomentodopresidiario" target="_blank"><span style="font-family: &quot;verdana&quot; , sans-serif;">Programa Momento do Presidiário no Facebook</span></a></div>
<div style='clear: both;'></div>
</div>
<div class='post-footer'>
<div class='post-footer-line post-footer-line-1'>

                                        </div></div>
                                      

                                        <div class="date-outer">
                                      
<h2 class='date-header'>
<span>
16 de fevereiro de 2017
</span>
</h2>

                                        <div class="date-posts">
                                      
<div class='post-outer'>
<div class='post hentry uncustomized-post-template' itemprop='blogPost' itemscope='itemscope' itemtype='http://schema.org/BlogPosting'>
<meta content='https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Ssr5OD02yA8/WKXNrw9pAbI/AAAAAAAAFeo/A2FyBB0I8PsSmMrn1Dsp0rBNARAQ3cSlACEw/s320/IMG-20170210-WA0031.jpg' itemprop='image_url'/>
<meta content='9078703298230476588' itemprop='blogId'/>
<meta content='4870377800298089935' itemprop='postId'/>
<a name='4870377800298089935'></a>
<h3 class='post-title entry-title' itemprop='name'>
<a href='http://programamomentodopresidiario.blogspot.com.br/2017/02/o-trabalho-da-unp-e-reconhecido-em.html'>
O Trabalho da UNP é reconhecido em audiência Publica no RS
</a>
</h3>
<div class='post-header'>
<div class='post-header-line-1'></div>
</div>
<div class='post-body entry-content' id='post-body-4870377800298089935' itemprop='articleBody'>
<br />
<div class="separator" style="clear: both; text-align: center;">
</div>
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="tr-caption-container" style="float: right; margin-left: 1em; text-align: right;"><tbody>
<tr><td style="text-align: center;"><a href="https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Ssr5OD02yA8/WKXNrw9pAbI/AAAAAAAAFeo/A2FyBB0I8PsSmMrn1Dsp0rBNARAQ3cSlACEw/s1600/IMG-20170210-WA0031.jpg" imageanchor="1" style="clear: right; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;"><img border="0" height="180" src="https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Ssr5OD02yA8/WKXNrw9pAbI/AAAAAAAAFeo/A2FyBB0I8PsSmMrn1Dsp0rBNARAQ3cSlACEw/s320/IMG-20170210-WA0031.jpg" width="320" /></a></td></tr>
<tr><td class="tr-caption" style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: &quot;trebuchet ms&quot; , sans-serif; font-size: xx-small;">Pastor Demétrio (Resp. UNP RS) Tem a palavra para explicar<br />o trabalho da UNP no EStado.</span></td></tr>
</tbody></table>
<br />
<h3 style="text-align: center;">
<span style="color: blue; font-family: &quot;helvetica neue&quot; , &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;helvetica&quot; , sans-serif;">Depoimentos atestam a importância da função social das Igrejas nos Presídios Gaúchos</span></h3>
<span style="font-family: &quot;helvetica neue&quot; , &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;helvetica&quot; , sans-serif; text-align: justify;"><br /></span>
<span style="font-family: &quot;helvetica neue&quot; , &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;helvetica&quot; , sans-serif; text-align: justify;">Na primeira audiência pública da CEFSIP (Comissão Especial para tratar da Função Social da Igreja nos Presídios e centros de recuperação de drogadição no RS), realizada sexta- feira (10) pela manhã, houve relatos de autoridades e entidades ligadas aos programas voltados á população encarcerada que atestaram a importância da assistência espiritual prestada pela UNP nos presídios do estado Rio Grande so Sul.</span><br />
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="tr-caption-container" style="float: left; margin-right: 1em; text-align: left;"><tbody>
<tr><td style="text-align: center;"><a href="https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-KbuK99rmz5E/WKXNsRUueoI/AAAAAAAAFec/QpjXdS4itHoNsX627RDemgdkZvoBpiC0gCLcB/s1600/DSC_0115.jpg" imageanchor="1" style="clear: left; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;"><img border="0" height="214" src="https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-KbuK99rmz5E/WKXNsRUueoI/AAAAAAAAFec/QpjXdS4itHoNsX627RDemgdkZvoBpiC0gCLcB/s320/DSC_0115.jpg" width="320" /></a></td></tr>
<tr><td class="tr-caption" style="text-align: center;"><span style="color: #3d85c6; font-family: &quot;verdana&quot; , sans-serif;"><b>Pr. Demétrio - UNP em Ação</b></span></td></tr>
</tbody></table>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;helvetica neue&quot; , &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;helvetica&quot; , sans-serif;">A comissão tem como presidente o Deputado Estadual Sérgio Peres (PRB) e como Vice Presidente a Deputada Liziane Bayer (PSB) tendo como Relator o Deputado Missionário Volnei (PR).</span></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;helvetica neue&quot; , &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;helvetica&quot; , sans-serif;">Estiveram presentes nesse dia a Presidente do Conselho de Comunidade da 10º Delegacia Penitenciária Regional da SUSEPE, Simone Zanella; A Defensora Pública Bárbara Lenzi; A Delegada Nadine Anflôr; O Capitão da Brigada Militar junto a Cadeia Pública de Porto Alegre, Vinicius Aires; A Representante da OAB, Andréia Teixeira da Rosa; O Representante da Sociedade Bíblica do Brasil (SBS), Rene Assumpção; Pastor Alcides Bayer; O Procurador do Ministério Público, Gilmar Bortolotto; A Diretora do Departamento Penal da SUSEPE, Maria Nadir Borba Minotto; Representando novemente a SUSEPE o Delegado Sandro de Oliveira; O Deputado Tiago Simon (PMDB); O Responsável pelo Trabalho da Universal nos Presídios no Estado (UNP), Pastor Demétrio Fernandes.</span></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="tr-caption-container" style="float: right; margin-left: 1em; text-align: right;"><tbody>
<tr><td style="text-align: center;"><a href="https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-GFyN2B5fUUw/WKXNsn2VNwI/AAAAAAAAFeg/Rb4400z4ghsuyvowyhHFnnDDb2Uiol5iQCLcB/s1600/20170212_155130-1.jpg" imageanchor="1" style="clear: right; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;"><img border="0" height="154" src="https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-GFyN2B5fUUw/WKXNsn2VNwI/AAAAAAAAFeg/Rb4400z4ghsuyvowyhHFnnDDb2Uiol5iQCLcB/s320/20170212_155130-1.jpg" width="320" /></a></td></tr>
<tr><td class="tr-caption" style="text-align: center;"><span style="color: #3d85c6; font-family: &quot;verdana&quot; , sans-serif; font-size: x-small;">Reunião com voluntários UNP no RS</span></td></tr>
</tbody></table>
<span style="font-family: &quot;helvetica neue&quot; , &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;helvetica&quot; , sans-serif;">-"Essa comissão fará com que as autoridades tenham seus olhares mais atentos para os trabalhos realizados e assim enxergarão a necessidade de dar maiores condições ao trabalho executado." Relata o Pastor Demétrio Fernandes (UNP).</span></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;helvetica neue&quot; , &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;helvetica&quot; , sans-serif;">O Dep. Tiago Simon (PMDB) falou sobre sua visita a Cadeia Pública de Porto Alegre: -" Lá encontramos duas situações bem distintas, onde o pavilhão dos evangélicos se distingue da degradação humana do restante do presídio."</span></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;helvetica neue&quot; , &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;helvetica&quot; , sans-serif;">O dep. Federal Carlos Gomes (PRB) reconheceu que o Estado não tem condições de ressocializar os apenados, enquanto que a atividade da igreja é efetiva na recuperação.</span></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;helvetica neue&quot; , &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;helvetica&quot; , sans-serif;">A Delegada Nadine Alflôr , disse que não tem dúvidas da importância das religiões nos presídios. Ela relatou experiência na Delegacia da Mulher de Canoas. -"A mulher quando chega na delegacia para denunciar seu parceiro, não quer vê-lo preso, quer a recuperação dele." explicou.</span></div>
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="tr-caption-container" style="float: left; margin-right: 1em; text-align: left;"><tbody>
<tr><td style="text-align: center;"><a href="https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-onjdiX0qYzE/WKWeaF-y94I/AAAAAAAAFdY/I_sgZD-yu_cokhCtAb2M1zBjNE2_NUQxwCEw/s1600/unp.jpg" imageanchor="1" style="clear: left; margin-bottom: 1em; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;"><img border="0" src="https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-onjdiX0qYzE/WKWeaF-y94I/AAAAAAAAFdY/I_sgZD-yu_cokhCtAb2M1zBjNE2_NUQxwCEw/s1600/unp.jpg" style="cursor: move;" /></a></td></tr>
<tr><td class="tr-caption" style="text-align: center;"><b><span style="color: #0b5394; font-family: &quot;verdana&quot; , sans-serif; font-size: small;">Universal Nos Presídios</span></b></td></tr>
</tbody></table>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;helvetica neue&quot; , &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;helvetica&quot; , sans-serif;">-"Já temos um projeto elaborado para abrirmos a primeira IURD no Estado, será na PEJ ( Penitenciária Estadual do Jacuí), em Charqueadas. Isso será possível devido a parceria firmada com a Força Tarefa da Brigada Militar que administra a penitenciária. Inclusive já temos local para executar esse projeto." Afirma Pastor Demétrio Fernandes (UNP).</span></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;helvetica neue&quot; , &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;helvetica&quot; , sans-serif;">A importância do Grupo UNP nos presídios é fundamental para a recuperação do detento e do egresso. Nessa comissão inclusive foram apresentados dados estatíticos levantados pelas próprias instituições</span></div>
<div style="text-align: justify;">
<span style="font-family: &quot;helvetica neue&quot; , &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;helvetica&quot; , sans-serif;">presentes. A assistência as famílias e a ex- detentos é constante. Atendemos aqui no RS, em frente aos presídios mais de 1.000 famílias por semana e realizamos cerca de 100 visitas por semana a casa de familiares de detentos." Completa Pastor Demétrio Fernandes (UNP).</span><br />
<span style="font-family: &quot;helvetica neue&quot; , &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;helvetica&quot; , sans-serif;"><br /></span>
<span style="color: #999999; font-family: &quot;verdana&quot; , sans-serif; font-size: x-small;"><b>Colaborou UNP RS</b></span><br />
<span style="font-family: &quot;verdana&quot; , sans-serif;">Acompanhe o trabalho da UNP através das nossas redes sociais:</span><br />
<span style="font-family: &quot;verdana&quot; , sans-serif;"><br /></span><span style="font-family: &quot;verdana&quot; , sans-serif;"><a href="http://facebook.com/bpeduardoguilherme" target="_blank">Bispo Eduardo Guilherme (Resp. UNP Brasil)</a></span><br />
<span style="font-family: &quot;helvetica neue&quot; , &quot;arial&quot; , &quot;helvetica&quot; , sans-serif;"></span><br />
<a href="https://www.facebook.com/programamomentodopresidiario" target="_blank"><span style="font-family: &quot;verdana&quot; , sans-serif;">Programa Momento do Presidiário no Facebook</span></a></div>
<div style='clear: both;'></div>
</div>

<div class='post-footer-line post-footer-line-3'>
<span class='post-location'>
</span>
</div>
</div>
